story:
FOLK MUSIC HERITAGE IN SERBIA

Every bird sings with her own voice.
And every nation has its own voice and song for which it is known. 

Dear friends,

I'm Vesna Milović, a solfeggio professor from Belgrade, Serbia. Since 2006. I have been searching various resources of musical folk heritage in Serbia. I have discovered and documented 1.004 songs: musical scores with chords and lyrics, from the oldest records of song's lyrics to lyrics used in our time, legends about the origin of certain songs, names of some of the songs, and collected other very interesting facts.

These are the songs that are sung everywhere, in Belgrade's famous Skadarlija, at Serbian celebrations, on radio and television stations, old and new folk songs originating from various regions and countries where Serbian people live, town songs, romances and well known folk songs of Hungarian, Romanian and Russian origin.

What makes this book different from others is the authorization of songs and history of the origins and development of Serbian folk and town music from ancient Slavs to present time, the arrival of romance music, with the history of radio singing from 1935. till 1975.

The book has three volumes and over 1.500 pages. The first volume is textual and other two contain musical scores. Book reviews were written by Prof. Dr. Dimitrije O. Golemović, the head of the Ethnomusicology Department at the Academy of Music in Belgrade, and Radoslav-Rade Vučković, composer and writer.

More informations about the book can be found on the official site:
Folk Music Heritage in Serbia

MY GOAL
My main goal with this book is to help preserve Serbian musical tradition, remind us of the authors of beautiful songs who are forgotten and to present a brief history of the origin and development of folk and town music which is not well known to the wider public.
You Tube - Folk Music Heritage in Serbia

WHAT I NEED & WHAT YOU GET
To publish the book I need financial support. Your donations will help with the printing and publication of the book.
Names of all donors will be published on the book's appreciation page.
All who donate $200 USD or more will receive as a gift, after the publication, one complete book set.

OTHER WAY YOU CAN HELP
You can also help by sharing with your family, relatives, friends and other people you know about this page and my funding campain. You can use Indiegogo share tools. 

Thank you in advance and I am glad that you will join me in preserving Serbian culture!


* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

MUZIČKA FOLKLORNA BAŠTINA U SRBIJI

Svaka ptica svojim glasom pjeva.
I svaki narod ima svoj glas i svoju pjesmu po kojoj se poznaje.

Dragi prijatelji,

Ja sam Vesna Milović, profesor solfeđa iz Beograda (Srbija). Od 2006. godine sam istraživala različite izvore muzičke folklorne baštine u Srbiji. Zabeležila sam 1.004 pesme: note sa akordima i tekstovima, od najstarijih zapisa tekstova pesama do tekstova prema današnjem izvođenju, legende o postanku pojedinih pesama, otkrila imena stvarnih više, manje ili slabo poznatih autora, nacionalno poreklo nekih pesama, te sabrala razne druge interesantne podatke.

To su pesme koje se pevaju u svakom društvu, u Skadarliji, na srpskim proslavama i veseljima, na radio i televizijskim stanicama, stare i nove narodne koje vode poreklo iz različitih krajeva i država gde živi srpski narod, gradske pesme, romanse i dobro poznate narodne pesme mađarskog, rumunskog i ruskog porekla.

Ono što ovu knjigu izdvaja od drugih knjiga je autorizacija pesama i istorija postanka i razvoja srpske narodne i gradske muzike od starih Slovena do danas, dolazak romansi, uz istoriju radio-pevanja od 1935. do 1975. godine.

Knjiga ima tri toma i preko 1.500 stranica. Prvi tom je tekstovni, a druga dva sadrže notne zapise. Recenzije su pisali prof. dr. Dimitrije O. Golemović, šef katedre za Etnomuzikologiju na Fakultetu muzičke umetnosti u Beogradu, i Radoslav-Rade Vučković, kompozitor i književnik.

Više informacija o knjizi može se naći na zvaničnoj veb stranici:
Muzička folklorna baština u Srbiji

MOJ CILJ
Moj glavni cilj sa ovom knjigom je da pomognem očuvanju srpske muzičke tradicije, podsetim na autore prelepih pesama koji su zaboravljeni i da predstavim kraću istoriju postanka i razvoja narodne i gradske muzike koja široj javnosti nije mnogo poznata.
YouTube - Muzička folklorna baština u Srbiji

ŠTA MI JE POTREBNO & ŠTA VI DOBIJATE
Da bih objavila knjigu potrebna mi je finansijska podrška. Vaša donacija će pomoći da knjiga izađe iz štampe i objavi se.
Imena svih donatora biće objavljena na zahvalnoj stranici knjige.
Donatori koji prilože $200 USD i više dobiće nakon izdavanja na poklon po jedan primerak kompletne knjige.

DRUGI NAČIN NA KOJI MOŽETE POMOĆI
Možete pomoći i ako sa svojom porodicom, rodbinom, prijateljima i poznanicima podelite ovu stranicu o doniranju knjige. Možete koristiti Indiegogo alatke za deljenje.

Unapred vam se zahvaljujem i radujem da ćete mi se pridružiti da zajedno čuvamo srpsku kulturu!

story:
The Project

A handwritten book. Not just hand-copied from a draft, but an original, handwritten manuscript, addressed specifically to one person. Like a cross between a journal and a letter, with elements of a roman à clef  thrown in. A personal story from the life of a poet in Paris, told directly to you, for your eyes only. This is a book that you alone will have sole possession of. 

I've always been fascinated by the idea of personalized writing, which I've explored in my essay collections by writing in response to suggested titles. This is another step in that process. Tailoring not just the ideas, or the content, but the entire book to one specific individual.

I wrote the first one recently, and presented it as a gift. The sensation of handing over 200 pages of un-copied longhand writing to another person was overwhelmingly powerful. It felt more significant than any presentation of a book ever had before. But it took a great deal of time and work to make it happen. And I won't be able to fulfill my dream of making a whole series of these books unless I have a little help freeing up that time.

 

What You Get

First and only handwritten drafts of uncensored, unedited writing. 

An intimate look into my world, my life, my thoughts. 

The rights to keep, copy, distribute (or not), and otherwise control the content of this writing going forward, with the sole provision that it doesn't appear as someone else's work. Which means that you'll have a totally unique thing to show your friends, and nobody else will have that same thing. And also, if I ever get really famous somehow, you'll wind up with a valuable object on  your hands. 

 

What I Need

Ideally, I would like to devote at least the next six months of my life to this project. Even if I don't have all that time devoted to commissions or pre-orders, I would still love to be handwriting books for people, and some of the people I would love to write one for could never afford to buy one. But during the time I'm working on this project, I'll need to pay my basic expenses (food, rent, etc) so that I can give it my full attention. And I'll also need to buy a lot of journals and pens along the way. But if you look at the amount I'm reaching for, and you spread it out over those months, you'll see that I'm not even trying to achieve minimum wage. I just hoping to (barely) survive while I do this work that I feel passionately about. In return, I'm striving to offer a special and unique experience to the reader.

The funding goal is flexible, because I will be devoting all the time I can to this project no matter what. But if I meet and exceed this goal, it will enable me to focus exclusively on this idea, and therefore to write more books for more people (including you!) during this time. 

 

FAQ

Q: Is your handwriting legible?      

A: Yes. I don't even write in cursive.

Q: Will the content be interesting to me, even if I don't know you very well?

A: I promise to include lots of juicy, intimate details. And besides, it's already the life and thoughts of an outsider poet living in the tiny rooms of Paris. Classic stuff, no?

Q: Can I order a book, or piece of writing, for someone other than myself?

A: Sure! Just send me a message, when claiming your perk, to let me know who you'd like it addressed to!

Q: If I pick a one-day perk, like a letter, postcard, or day from your life, can I choose a specific day or special occasion?

A: Sure, why not? As long as it's possible. For the day together, we'd have to make sure we're in the same country, for example. If you have any kind of special request, just let me know and I'll try to work it out with you!

Q: Will this writing ever be published?

A: The recipient of each book will have sole control over that decision. If you buy a piece of writing, you will own the only copy and all the rights to decide whether it is ever typed, shared, published, etc, provided that the writing in question isn't presented as someone else's work. As you will possess the only copy, it can never be printed, performed, or distributed (by me or anyone else) except by your request and permission.

Q: What if I don't like what you write?

A: If you're not already familiar with my writing, then hopefully you're interested in this project because you're either curious about my lifestyle, or interested in the uniqueness of the object itself. In either of these cases, there will certainly be something in there for you. And if after all that, you're still not happy with the book, you might be able to sell it to someone else ;). 

Q: If I own the rights, can I publish your writing under my own name?

A: No, that's the one thing you can't do. You can print it, display it, copy it, share it, publish it, authorize its use by others (with my authorship attached), and even sell it for a profit and keep the money. The one thing you can't do is pass it off as someone else's writing. My name gets to follow it around. But look at the bright side... I also get all the blame :). 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is probably that I will go through waves of more and less interesting thoughts, and thus more and less interesting writing during the time that I'm working on these books. That's hard to avoid. But those who know me, and know my previous work, know that I always do whatever I can to push myself into the corners of my thoughts and dig for something deeper than surface observation. Whatever I'm going through, I trust that I will find a way to share it with you candidly and richly. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to contribute, or order a book of your own, that's fine. Many of my favorite people are in that situation!  But if you think the project is interesting, please consider sharing this page with someone else who might contribute.

And if you don't want to spam your friends with a crowdfunder (which I also totally understand), you could still help out by supporting my social media pages. Perhaps you could like my author page on facebook? Follow me on twitter? Watch a video on my youtube? Or maybe even rate one of my books on goodreads? You'd be amazed at how much those little things help. And more than anything, they lift my spirits when I'm nervous about a new project.

Thank you for taking the time to read through all this, and for any encouragement you can offer. It's always a risk presenting new creative ideas for public consideration, and I hope that this idea has been worth your time to consider. Feel free to let me know if you have any questions or suggestions! 

Thanks to Mark Fitzpatrick for offering up the befitting phrase Bespoke Books at the inception of this idea!

story:
Summary

Hi I’m Tera.  I’m a social worker who has worked with young people for years.  My career has taught me one thing. Everyone, regardless of circumstances has a dream. They dream of being normal everyday people like the rest of the world.  They dream of achieving in life.  The problem?  Usually, they don't know how to reach those goals without the distactions.   How to navigate all the drama that life can bring. 

Well, I believe that sometimes all young people need is someone to talk to.  Someone to listen and be real with them about the world.  I’ve tried to do that my entire career.  I found that being that sounding board works wonders.  Does it solve all the problems? No, but what does?  What I do is help teens and young adults realize that there are alternatives to their issues that won’t land them in trouble or bad situations. 

So, I wrote this book called Dream Haters.   It’s simple, I discuss the most common haters (problems) that are encountered by young adults and offer them realistic, practical ways to deal with the issue.  I also sprinkle in words of wisdom from others who have overcome obstacles and challenges in life to become successful.

I need your support because I desire to share this book with as many young people as possible.  I have decided to self-publish this book and it requires funding to start.   Your assistance will help me reach thousands of young people I would never otherwise have access to.  Your assistance can help make the difference in the life of a young adult reaching their dreams.

What We Need and What You’ll Get

I will probably need about $4500 to publish Dream Haters.  I’m asking for a smaller amount ($3500) to be humble and realistic in my beginnings.   Any amount used will go towards the publishing and distribution fees.  If I exceed my goal, I will use that funding to print additional books and offer them pro-bono to youth programs, schools, and clubs that can’t afford to purchase the books for their kids.  (I do cool workshops with young adults and the adults who work with them, so I can offer this as another way of reaching more kids!)

The publishing company gave me an estimate to begin with.   My set up fees including book layout, cover, technical and digital set up total $2500.00.  That doesn’t even include editing or any printing of books.   So, as you can see, $3500.00 is a conservative request.   Remember Indiegogo has to get their fee as well!   Every cent received will go into this book, so even if I don’t reach my goal, it will help me to get closer to getting this book out to deserving young people. (Just may take a little longer.)

If, or should I say, WHEN I reach my goal, I have a few perks for my supporters.   For a donation of $10, I will send you a personal thank you note.  For a donation of $25, I will give you a personal thank you note as well as a shout on my Twitter Feed @terarreid.   For a donation of $50, I will give you all the perks for $10 and $25 donations, plus an autographed copy of Dream Haters.   For a donation of $75, you will get all the perks of the $10 and $25 donations, plus a personal acknowledgement in Dream Haters for your support.   For a donation of $100, you will get all the prior perks, plus an invite to my Dream Haters book launch party (TBA-travel at your own expense.)

 

The Impact   

I could spend a lot of time giving you statistics, but the reality is that you see the result of a lack of guidance among young people every day.  You see the news feeds and hear the stories of young adults dropping out of school, struggling with substance use, involvement in criminal activities, and mimicking what they think they should be.   The list can go on, but I’m not here to depress anyone.  I try my hardest to help uplift others.  The way I do that is through inspiration, wisdom, and sound advice.  Why choose me?  Not to brag, but I’m good at what I do.  Not for any accolades, but because I care about young people having great futures.  I haven’t “saved” every child I worked with, but I do like to think I impacted quite a few positively.   Most recently, two young ladies I mentor have gone on to earn their high school diplomas after being previously kicked out of school.  Now, I will never take credit for their hard work, but I do like to think that my motivation helped some.  I hope that you will agree with me and help me to spread my love to some more deserving young people with wonderful futures ahead of them. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don’t want to or are not able to contribute financially, you can still help!  Share my link through social media, your friends, and your family.   Find someone who believes in helping kids and is willing to contribute. Every little bit helps and I would be most grateful for any support you can offer!!

I need your support because I desire to share this book with as many young people as possible.  I have decided to self-publish this book and it requires funding to start.   Your assistance will help me reach thousands of young people I would never otherwise have access to.  Your assistance can help make the difference in the life of a young adult reaching their dreams.
What We Need and What You’ll Get
I will probably need about $4500 to publish Dream Haters.  I’m asking for a smaller amount ($3500) to be humble and realistic in my beginnings.   Any amount used will go towards the publishing and distribution fees.  If I exceed my goal, I will use that funding to print additional books and offer them pro-bono to youth programs, schools, and clubs that can’t afford to purchase the books for their kids.  (I do cool workshops with young adults and the adults who work with them, so I can offer this as another way of reaching more kids!)
The publishing company gave me an estimate to begin with.   My set up fees including book layout, cover, technical and digital set up total $2500.00.  That doesn’t even include editing or any printing of books.   So, as you can see, $3500.00 is a conservative request.   Remember Indiegogo has to get their fee as well!   Every cent received will go into this book, so even if I don’t reach my goal, it will help me to get closer to getting this book out to deserving young people. (Just may take a little longer.)
If, or should I say, WHEN I reach my goal, I have a few perks for my supporters.   For a donation of $10, I will send you a personal thank you note.  For a donation of $25, I will give you a personal thank you note as well as a shout on my Twitter Feed @terarreid.   For a donation of $50, I will give you all the perks for $10 and $25 donations, plus an autographed copy of Dream Haters.   For a donation of $75, you will get all the perks of the $10 and $25 donations, plus a personal acknowledgement in Dream Haters for your support.   For a donation of $100, you will get all the prior perks, plus an invite to my Dream Haters book launch party (TBA-travel at your own expense.)
 
The Impact   
I could spend a lot of time giving you statistics, but the reality is that you see the result of a lack of guidance among young people every day.  You see the news feeds and hear the stories of young adults dropping out of school, struggling with substance use, involvement in criminal activities, and mimicking what they think they should be.   The list can go on, but I’m not here to depress anyone.  I try my hardest to help uplift others.  The way I do that is through inspiration, wisdom, and sound advice.  Why choose me?  Not to brag, but I’m good at what I do.  Not for any accolades, but because I care about young people having great futures.  I haven’t “saved” every child I worked with, but I do like to think I impacted quite a few positively.   Most recently, two young ladies I mentor have gone on to earn their high school diplomas after being previously kicked out of school.  Now, I will never take credit for their hard work, but I do like to think that my motivation helped some.  I hope that you will agree with me and help me to spread my love to some more deserving young people with wonderful futures ahead of them. 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you don’t want to or are not able to contribute financially, you can still help!  Share my link through social media, your friends, and your family.   Find someone who believes in helping kids and is willing to contribute. Every little bit helps and I would be most grateful for any support you can offer!!

story:
The Video

 The video will give you a small idea of what the Dark Saga series is about.

 Who Am I?

 My name is David Andrew Crawford and I am the author of Dark Solus An Assassin’s Tale, a novel I wrote and published in November 24, 2011.  This is the first book in the Dark Saga Series, and the second book and reason why I am here is Demon’s Revenge.  I dreamed of being an author and bringing to life all the crazy things my mind could come up with.  So, a few years ago I (lost my mind) decided to leave my fulltime job and began writing the story of Dark Solus in my little mobile trailer that had an indoor waterfall (the waterfall being a huge hole in my roof). I self published and it was then that I realized publishing a book costs money, a lot of money and most of it needed to go into advertisement.  So now you know the reason why I am here.

 A little bit more about me is that I live in a little place called Innesville in Canada with my two dogs Ares, the friendly giant and Ariel, the little princess, both three year old Rottweilers.  I am an entrepreneur and an environmentalist. I am a hard worker & for the next several months, writing this novel is my job. 

 About The Novel

First let me say that my first novel Dark Solus An Assassin’s Tale has won 2 awards both in the Fantasy genre and both in contests held in the United States.  In February 2012 I won 2nd place in the Written Art Awards and in August 2012 I won Bronze in the Readers Favorite. 

In order to understand my second novel, may I give you a brief history of Book 1.  Dark Solus, An Assassin's Tale, the first book in the Dark Saga, is a dark, fantasy novel about one of the deadliest assassins on the planet Eorth. The evil wizard Kalifen, along with the ruthless leaders of the Assassins, Thieves and Halflings guilds, murdered Dark Solus' parents when he was only a child. Haunted by their merciless execution, he now waits and prepares to exact his revenge on all those responsible for their demise. Dark is transformed and trained by the Styg, the warden of the Stygian depths, and his grandfather Mephistopheles, an ancient silver dragon. Twelve years later, Dark is now ready to travel to the City of Duergar, the home of his enemies. Trained in the skills of assassination, and armed with lethal magic devices and knowledge of the dark arts, he has set himself only one mission.....to kill them all!

Now with the first leg of his quest over, the second book in the Dark Saga Series, Demon’s Revenge finds him in the city of Duergar as he begins to set his plan for vengeance in motion.  Aided by the powerful artefact, the Eye of Dagda, he enters the city under the guise of Giachomo, the Jester, and sets out to destroy the Halflings’ Guild and its leader Sneak Longfoot, the Grand Master of the Guild.

Darkness will fall upon the kingdom of Duergar as one lone assassin rises up against the sinister forces who have gone, as of yet, unpunished.  On his quest for vengeance, Dark must face his first of many terrifying tasks that poses as much risk to himself as it does to his target.  Any doubts he may have he will bury with the dead as he puts into play a plan that will have him hunt down and kill his numerous enemies, with his shadowy blade dripping with the blood of the vanquished.

Dark, using all his skill as an assassin and his powerful arsenal of magical items, causes murder and mayhem throughout the fortified City of the Dwarves.  One by one the leaders of the Guilds and their followers must pay for the injustice carried out on his parents.  Then and only then will Dark have peace in the knowledge that his parents have been avenged. 

Vampires, werewolves and 50 foot tall zombies oh my!      

What we need and what you get

 The $17,000 that will be raised will be used to fund/promote/advertise the first and second novel as well as assist with expenses for producing the second novel.

  • professional editing
  • cover design, back and front
  • book formatting
  • print setup and costs
  • a host of online marketing initiatives
  • shipping
  • E-book conversion
  • website updates and fees
  • a new book trailer
  • major expense will be for professional publicity/advertising
  • Indiegogo and Paypal fees
  • any other additional fees
  • Mostly, you’d be helping me launch this book with the full integrity of a traditionally published novel. 

And if we don’t meet our goal?

Cross fingers (I am actually crossing my fingers), let's hope that doesn't happen.  If we raise any amount of money, we'll still have a stellar, professional product and those who have donated will still get the goods.  If we don't make it that far, the money will be used on the highest priority initiatives - editing, formatting, cover design and a advertising - in that order - as well as getting the book to you.  I'll do everything in my power to make sure you get a professional product.  That's priority one! 

 Getting the Word Out

If you are unable to contribute, please at the very least like the page and share us on Facebook, Twitter and Google+.  Share this campaign by using Indiegogo’s share tools located directly under the video.  If you have a website, blog, please share our link with your family, friends and neighbours.  Thank you for all your support, your contributions and your encouragement.

story:
GIVE US A REASON TO ROCK A RHYME!

The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go. (Dr. Seuss)

WHO

You & Me. We can do this! Yours truly, of course, is the mastermind with the remixes and rhymes. I'm a former English major who is utterly fascinated with the written word. By profession, I am a marcomm strategist and event planner. As the daughter of educators, I have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge and learning. Whether finger tapping a keyboard or putting pen to paper, I'll make the words in my mind sing a song on the page. However, this project requires a team effort which means Y-O-U. Since I am not yet the millionaire I aspire to be and Oprah's not currently in my rolodex, I am creatively financing this project. With our combined efforts, a colorful children's book series will spring to life.

WHAT

Quriouser & Quriouser (ode to Alice in Wonderland) will be a boutique publishing imprint to produce, the too many to name, idea buds sprouting in my brain. Rhyme & Reason, a children's book series, is the first bud to blossom in my garden. It's an idea whose time has come after percolating in the egg that is my head for a wee bit now.

It all started with a classic family roadtrip. You know, a few hours and some change cruising your local interstate. It's amazing the random things you chat about when you're on lockdown in a car and you have a captive audience. On this day, the topic of nursery rhymes was our food for thought. We quickly realized that most, if not all, nursery rhymes had found a clever, rhythmic way to tell some not-so-nice stories (i.e. an irreparably cracked egg, a baby cradle crashing to the ground, three blind mice, etc.) Really? Upon further research, I learned most rhymes were coded messages of unpleasant historical events. Even the best of them often referenced things we've no clue about in the modern era. Without cheating, what are curds & whey? And what about a tuffet?

After much poking and prodding, nagging and nudging by family and friends, I finally gave in and accepted the challenge of remixing the rhymes and riddles of our childhood. Since most children have grown up with the classics while developing into fairly well-adjusted adults, my goal is to not replace the seemingly harmless, oldie but goodies. Rather, it is my goal to update the classics with a contemporary flair and positive messages. I simply wish to create another option for the nursery, nursery school or pre-school shelf. Hence, I give you Rhyme & Reason!

WHEN

Our campaign launches now in honor of NEA's National Read Across America Day (3/1) and Dr. Seuss's birthday (3/2). For the next 30 days, we will appeal to friends and family, neighbors and strangers, moms and dads, aunties and uncles, sisters and brothers, nanas and papas, who believe that reading sows the seeds of knowledge in the youngest of us. Nursery rhymes and fairy tales are often a toddler or preschooler's first story-telling experience. So without further ado, now is the time, and time is of the essence!

WHERE

For now, the best place to find us is right here on our Indiegogo page (until we have a web page, a web site may take a bit longer). At least once a week, and more often if the spirit moves us, we'll post power nuggets (a.k.a. updates about our project) and maybe even a resourceful link or two. We're also plotting and planning a strategy to take our project to the streets so keep your eyes open and ears peeled. Like Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, you can never know where we'll appear...rabbit holes or tea parties anyone?!

WHY

I believe that "Reading is Fundamental" as a way of life (and not just the nation's largest nonprofit children's literacy organization - see www.rif.org). As a child, my parents gave me my very own first book collection a.k.a. the Little Golden Books, including the Poky Little Puppy and the Little Engine That Could. I read the Mini-Pages every weekend after kidnapping them from the grown-ups' newspaper. As soon as I could read, I had my first magazine subscription, Ebony Jr. (unfortunately, no longer in publication). Then I moved on to Trixie Belden and Nancy Drew, and I have had a love of reading every since. To this very day, Curious George and the Berenstein Bears are two of my all-time favs. So the WHY is simple, I want to plant the seeds of knowledge and nurture the love of books at the earliest possible age and first opportunity!

HOW

Welcome to the wonderful world of self-publishing, crowdfunding and the platform that is Indiegogo. This is where my vision, your funding and our combined actions can make a dream a reality. With your support Quriouser & Quriouser's first brain bud, Rhyme and Reason, will blossom into a children book series for savvy moms and pops with little bitty kiddies and tots. Every morsel of every contribution will get this ball rolling!

Writing & Editing

I am happy to write, but I'll need to contract the services of an editor. Think, "He who represents himself in court has an idiot for a lawyer and a fool for a client." In this same spirit, even the best writer should be wise and humble enough not edit their own manuscripts. Plus, after a few drafts, the ink cartridges and reams of paper start to add up so office supplies are on the wish list.

Illustration & Design

While I love tinkering both freehand and digitally, I am the definition of an amateur artist. However, I am also a perfectionist so now is not the time to put my skills to the test. With that in mind, I will be hiring a professional illustrator/designer to custom create images for each one of my new and improved rhymes. Not sure if the budget will accommodate, but I would love to incorporate pop-up pictures.

Printing & Binding

All books in the series will be available as both as an e-book as well as a traditional hard cover book (and eventually, audio, too). Everyone loves a great story read aloud at school or at bedtime. Digital media is great for a lot of things, but nothing compares to colorful illustrations, the turn of a crisp page or the voice of a dramatic storyteller. To this end, funding will also cover costs associated with production, binding and distribution of the hard covers as well as ISBN registrations and filing copyright protections.

Marketing & Communications

It goes without saying that a portion of funds raised will be invested to a dedicated website (and possibly an app for that) and grassroots marketing campaign.  A major component of the website will be the ability to purchase and downloand PDF versions of the books with color illustrations. In addition, I aspire to a mini book tour (as in gas in the tank for me to drive to schools and bookstores brave and kind enough to let me spread my literary sunshine). 

Miscellaneous

Although we are ambitious and confident we'll reach or exceed our funding goal, rest assured that we are also resourceful. Should the money tree not shake as freely as we'd like, whatever funding we are fortunate enough to receive will still be whole-heartedly applied to moving this project forward. There are no IFs involved here, it's only a matter of WHEN and, of course, we are hoping for sooner rather than later so we can "be the change we wish to see in this world." Shout-out to Gandhi!

GIVE ONE, GROW ONE

Earlier, I was talking about brain buds, sprouts and blossoms for good rhymes and even better reasons. Forget bookworms, we prefer lady bugs. Qurioser & Quriosier is on a mission to spread the bug for reading because we think the power of knowledge is contagious. With your help, we can plant new buds, grow new sprouts and blossom new readers. Once we are out the gate, up and running, we will be joining the buy one, give one movement (www.b1g1.com). Once we're turning profit, we plan to gift a book for every book sold. We can't think of a better way to pay it forward!

FINAL THOUGHTS

Contributions, big and small, are equally appreciated! If you don't have a leaf to spare from your money tree, you can still help us leap forward by spreading the word, posting the link, visiting us on the web, or anything else that comes to mind. You really can make a difference in more ways than one!

Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try! (Dr. Seuss)

story:
Having lived a life of action and adventure my passion is sharing with others through the art of storytelling.

Meet the Author

Hi, I'm Michael Alexander. I’m an author from Los Angeles, California, and I've spent most of my adulthood chasing adventure. A former medic in the United States Air Force and a former fire fighter for a major metropolitan city, I've done some amazing things. Things most people can only dream about and been in life and death situations, some too close for comfort. I’m a 32 Degree Scottish Rite Freemason and having been knighted as a Knights Templar, I’ve delved deep into the mysteries of secret societies. Are the conspiracy theories true...Hmm (maybe)? With a Master's Degree in Diplomacy and International Relations, my background is rich in ancient history and mythology and all of my experience and education have worked together to create an imaginative new story where a secret society of thieves work to keep the world safe from immensely powerful beings that once walked the earth.


Why the Campaign

I love the art of storytelling and I write stories that I like to read. Stories full of exciting but believable action between heroes and villains, pitting good against evil, but most importantly, the human aspect. My stories focus on the relationships between the characters and how living through the trials and tribulations make or break them. Thieves of Elysium is a new and intriguing story where likeable characters, both good and notorious, are so out of place it takes all they have to survive and overcome the hardships they face.

But I can’t do it without your help. I need to raise $6000 to cover the cost of publishing both novels and “Officially” release the series. So, I’m turning to my strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, I’m offering autographed copies of the novels, eBooks, and merchandise with the Thieves of Elysium logo. Your contributions will help me attain my dream of becoming a published author and more importantly you will strengthen Indie Authors everywhere as more and more authors Self-Publish and break away from the stranglehold of traditional publishing.


The Thieves of Elysium

 Series

The underground city of Elysium has remained a secret for nearly a thousand years buried deep beneath the Himalayan Mountains in what many call, "The Inner Earth." The secret society of thieves dating back to the crusades has remained to this day, an invisible influence throughout the world. Elysian Thieves have become the best trained operatives throughout history acquiring whatever artifacts need to be taken to keep the world safe. For within Elysium stands a portal to Mythos, the Land of the Gods. A refuge for the mythological heroes and gods of old that once walked the earth, before the Great Flood that drove them to another realm. Mythos is a land of beauty and temptation beyond description and an ancient evil stirs within its borders with Elysium in its sights.

The series centers around Phoenix, a courageous fire fighter who has yet to discover why he can touch fire and not get burned and why death eludes him time and again. When circumstances and family secrets are revealed he discovers the existence of the ancient Thieves Guild and must come to terms with his true heritage. His family and Elysium are in grave danger and he must sacrifice everything to save those he loves. Thieves of Elysium is a modern day "Indiana Jones," shrouded in mythology and ancient mysteries to create a series full of action and adventure, love and romance, sacrifice and duty.



Risen from Ashes

When arson is needed to steal rare Babylonian artifacts revealing the location of an antediluvian treasure deep within one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, Phoenix, Los Angeles’ most courageous fire fighter, is blackmailed into doing the job. But his unique gift of standing in fire and not getting burned wasn’t the only reason he was chosen. Not only does he discover an age-old secret society of thieves dedicated to, “keeping the world safe,” but his ties to the ancient Thieves Guild are much closer than he knows. The kidnapping of his daughter forces his wife to reveal her deepest kept secret as they traverse the globe with the aid of less than savory black-market scoundrels and infiltrate the underground city of Elysium, the thief guild’s sacred paradise. His daughter used as bait, Phoenix is lured deeper down the rabbit hole where he discovers his family’s true heritage, and the reason why he cheats death again and again. But the magical city is on the verge of collapse as an ancient evil seeks to reclaim the power and riches that Elysium holds. Phoenix’s only concern is saving his family and returning to their charmed life but uncontrollable events in Elysium forces him to confront his families hidden past where reality and mythology are often one and the same.

Risen from Ashes is the first book in the Thieves of Elysium series where a seemingly ordinary man must take the hero’s journey far beyond the realm of reality into a land where heroes, gods, and riches untold abound.


Excerpt from "Risen from Ashes"

Tacitus stood next him and looked at the crowd below. "The people of Elysium need a hero."

"I didn't come here to be their savior." Phoenix glared at him. "I came to rescue my family."

"The time has come when we must sacrifice everything to save what is most important."

"Sacrifice?" Phoenix growled as he walked away. "I've lost everyone that I love, everything that I had is gone. I have nothing to offer."

Tacitus approached him holding his head high. "Then you must rise from the ashes."

"How?" Phoenix choked on his words. "How do I do that?"

"To begin..." Tacitus held out the ring. "I will train you to be one of the greatest thieves the Guild has ever known."


Love-Lies-Bleeding

In “Love-Lies-Bleeding,” Conradin, one of Elysium’s greatest thieves is the commander of an elite unit known as Shadow Team. He must lead a rescue mission into the fabled land of Mythos to rescue Rebecca, the daughter of a prominent Guild Council Member. The young and beautiful thief ventured into Mythos in search of the legendary Amaranth flower. A flower of undying beauty that never fades; the flower she wanted to give to her husband on their wedding day.

Locating her captors, The Shadow Team discover she is meant to be a sacrifice at a ceremony to unify the Satyrian tribes under Therion, the self-proclaimed King of the Satyrs, and an estranged son of Hermes. But Therion’s ambitions go even further, he’s formed an unholy alliance with the Veradunii, a magical race forbidden in Mythos, in order to depose his father’s rule and bring Mythos and Elysium under his dominion.

The Shadow Team also meets Agreus, a Satyroi Seer who prophesies the coming heir to the Blades of Fire, the one who will rise from the ashes to defend Elysium in the coming war with Mythos. Conradin must now choose between assassinating Therion and protecting his homeland or saving Rebecca, his fiancée.

Love-Lies-Bleeding is a story of love and sacrifice where one of Elysium’s greatest heroes must choose between his heart and his duty to Elysium.


Why the prequel?

Although I am tirelessly working on the sequel to Risen from Ashes, I was surprised how many people wanted to know more about Conradin, the scar-faced thief and his tragic back story. Since he plays a significant role in the rest of the series I felt it necessary to write a story revealing his background. Love-Lies-Bleeding adds depth to the series revealing more about Elysium, Mythos, and several other characters that will play a major factor in subsequent novels. Instead of weighing Risen from Ashes down with a ton of flashbacks and side stories I choose to write a separate novel to compliment the series. I hope you enjoy it!

The Aesch-Mezareph, the Burning Rose of Elysium


The Goal

The goal is to get both "Risen from Ashes," and "Love-Lies-Bleeding," published with Amazon's CreateSpace, the world's leading Self-Publishing company. Amazon leads the world in book distribution and reaching our financial goal will allow me to work with their publishing team.

The end results will be:

  • "Risen from Ashes" in physical softcover format
  • "Risen from Ashes" in eBook through Amazon
  • "Love-Lies-Bleeding" in physical softcover format
  • "Love-Lies-Bleeding" in eBook through Amazon
  • Cover art for "Love-Lies-Bleeding"
  • Interior design for both novels in physical and eBook format
  • Marketing essentials with CreateSpace to align the "Thieves of Elysium" series in the market place to reach its target audience and promote the series through Amazon and everywhere books are sold
  • Professional Editor that will oversee both manuscripts through the editorial process of Line Editing and Copyediting to ensure the finest quality and highly polished novels

"Love-Lies-Bleeding" will go through the editing process from start to finish while "Risen from Ashes," already published in eBook format, will go through a minor Line Editing and be repackaged for global distribution.

NOTE: Softcover vs. Hardcover

After speaking with the Senior Publishing Consultant at Amazon's Createspace I've learned that hardcover books are not only very expensive to produce but are dropping in demand. Although I prefer the old fashion traditional hardcover format I have chosen to go with the market's demand for softcover and eBook formats. Hopefully one day soon, when the series is successful I can have hardcovers made for those that prefer them, such as myself.

In addition:

All money raised above and beyond to cover the publishing expenses will be used to create:

  • A professional author's website for fans to stay up-to-date with the latest news on the "Thieves of Elysium" series and new projects from me, the author.
  • Merchandise (T-shirts, Posters, bookmarks, and coffee mugs)
  • Marketing and Advertising


The Budget

I value your trust and appreciate your generosity. Your contributions will go to publish the first two novels and officially launch the series.

Self-Publishing doesn't mean the author does it all alone. I employ a team of professional editors, designers, and cover artists that work diligently to produce the finest product for you, the customer.


What your money pays for:


Risen from Ashes

Createspace Publishing Services
  • Publishing Essentials Line Editing: $1,800
  • Publishing Essentials Marketing: $300
  • Interior book design: $250
  • Amazon Kindle Conversion for eBook: $70

Total Cost to Publish Risen from Ashes: $2,420


Love-Lies-Bleeding

Createspace Publishing Services
  • Editing Package: $2,000
  • Publishing Essentials Marketing: $300
  • Interior book design: $250
  • Amazon Kindle Conversion for eBook: $70
  • Book Cover Design and Artwork (Edge of Water Designs): $300

Total Cost to Publish Love-Lies-Bleeding: $2,920


Edge of Water Designs

  • Thieves of Elysium Poster: $400
  • Thieves of Elysium Book Mark: $40
  • Thieves of Elysium Marketing Postcards (5x7): $70
  • Logo Designs: $150

Total cost for Marketing Material: $660


Total cost to publish both novels: $6000



Elysium's Treasure Trove

Elysium's treasure vault is full of spoils, riches, plunder, and goods but we'll just call them PERKS and I can't wait to give them away to you.

  • eBooks of both Risen from Ashes and Love-Lies-Bleeding
  • Autographed Softcover copy of Risen from Ashes
  • Autographed Softcover copy of Love-Lies-Bleeding
  • Autographed Book Mark with the Thieves of Elysium Series Logo
  • Autographed Thieves of Elysium Series poster
  • and more...


The Impact

Readers are the new Gatekeepers of today's markets...not the all powerful publishing houses that once dominated the literary world. The FANS get to decide what they want to read and in what format.

Your contributions will make the Thieves of Elysium series a reality. Only by supporting Indie Artists can new and exciting stories be told outside the realm of traditional publishing.

As an Independent or Indie Author, we must compete with the established publishing houses that have controlled what the public gets to read for far too long. As an Indie Author we take our art directly to you the reader on our own terms. Which more often than not means stories that are more interesting and more unique then the cookie cutter predictable stories that corporate publishing houses churn out.

Your contributions and support will help pave the way for more Independent Authors to produce high quality work and redefine the publishing industry.


Sharing is Caring

Hey, it's not always easy to contribute, I get it.  But that doesn't mean you can't help.  Only with YOUR support can I make this series a success.


What can YOU do to help you ask???


  • Spread the Word: Share the campaign with your family and friends

  • Follow the series on FACEBOOK

  • Follow me on TWITTER

  • Meet me on Goodreads


Please share with your family and friends using the Indiegogo share tools!

The more people that are aware of the campaign the greater chance of success.

These are all great ways for us to connect and for you to stay up-to-date with the campaign and the Thieves of Elysium Series.

As an author I believe it is my job to connect with my fans and make myself available. Please don't hesitate to contact me using the links above to chat about the series or anything in particular.

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Ayurvéda Révolution, c’est un portail d’envergure mondiale où l’on trouve une bibliothèque d’articles de référence, des séries vidéo éducatives et un bottin de ressources internationales 

Tout un éventail d’informations pour se soigner, se nourrir et vivre en symbiose avec la nature, réunies en un site Internet convivial qui enseigne l’Ayurvéda, médecine traditionnelle de l’Inde.


▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬

L'Ayurvéda a été conçu à l'origine par les anciens qui, soucieux de soutenir l'humanité dans ses migrations urbaines, nous ont transmis comment soigner le stress engendré par ces regroupements.


Explorez dès maintenant les premiers pas d'Ayurveda Revolution !  ☞


Nous croyons en l’importance de l’autonomie pour évoluer au-delà des limites du système et faire face aux défis modernes. L'Ayurvéda renferme un potentiel énorme pour apporter des solutions à nos problèmes actuels de santé.

Plusieurs médecins et acteurs du domaine de la santé et du monde académique s'intéressent à nos enseignements et activités, tels que le Dr. Samuel Blain qui championne la médecine intégrative au Québec et l'université de Montréal qui prépare un certificat en médecine holistique.

Nous envisageons organiser un mouvement pour réunir médecine moderne et holistique et émettre des recommandations concrètes aux autorités de la santé publique du Québec.


▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬


Notre objectif : 7 000 $

Votre aide permettra l’envol d’une plateforme éducative, accessible à toute personne souhaitant améliorer sa santé et simplifier son existence. 


Équipement nécessaire

- Canon 60D

- Microphone Rode Video mic

- Trepied Jolly Gorillapod

- Monopod Manfrotto

- Tête Manfrotto

- Support pour DSLR

- Pile Protama Lp-E6

- Polaroid 144 LED camera light with variable color temp and dimmable brightness control (3200K - 5600K)


Si on dépassait notre objectif ...

Afin d’atteindre les 4 coins du globe et de développer le potentiel international de l’Ayurvéda, nous entamerons aussitôt nos démarches pour traduire le site en plusieurs langues. À commencer par :

- Traduire le site en anglais, incluant les séries vidéos

- Élaborer une carte interactive d'endroits clefs partout dans le monde


Vous contribuez à

 -  PRÉSERVER l'authenticité de l'Ayurvéda dans son essor international 
 -  CRÉER une plateforme éducative accessible aux quatre coins du globe 
 -  TRANSFORMER l'approche de la santé en Occident 

Merci à nos commanditaires

Arayuma rend accessible une gamme d’épices de très haute qualité, biologiques et équitables, ainsi qu’un lait et une eau de coco exceptionnels.

arayuma.com

Un centre ayurvédique complet offrant produits spécialisés, consultations ainsi qu’une gamme inédite de soins spécialisés.

espaceayurveda.ca


Crédits Musique ♪

Groupe Ô 

Pierre-Olivier Bolduc - Innersound (Ursa Minor)

Philippe Edwards - Tempura, chants harmoniques et de gorge

▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬
         

On se présente :


Charlotte "Coconut" : Partisane de l'autonomie et de la liberté, je suis un jour tombée sur une femme qui a vulgarisé les ingrédients de ma crème à mains : Corinne Gouget. Ce fût la Révolution. Ma salle de bain, ma cuisine, ma vie, celle de mon chat et de tout mon entourage y ont passé : une tornade du retour aux sources et née.
L'herboristerie a toujours été pour moi la Nature qui offre ses remèdes à ses petits, mais quand j'ai découvert l'Ayurvéda, ça a pris tout son sens. Le jour où on s'est rencontrés fut le même que celui où j'ai décidé de m'y consacrer. 
Jadis, je me suis collée à plusieurs Univers différents : juridique, fiscal, artistique, langues étrangères, peinture automobile, entrepreneuriat, sciences pures, et à présent, herboristerie et Ayurvéda. 

Aujourd'hui, j'unifie ma curiosité passionnée à un mode de vie qui m'offre la liberté de suivre mes inspirations et de m'immerger dans les expérimentations quotidiennes de l'Ayurvéda et des plantes médicinales.


Jonathan "Herbo Joe" : J’ai découvert l’Ayurvéda en 2000 lors de mon premier séjour en Inde. Je suis tombé sévèrement malade et un médecin comprit sans mot dire mon problème, simplement à la lecture de mon pouls. Il résolut mon état rapidement grâce à quelques plantes médicinales.

Désireux d’apprendre des « vrais de vrais » je suis retourné à maintes reprises dans ce pays pour étudier à la source. Je me suis lié d'amitié avec Dr. Kannan, qui s'est avéré être l'héritier d'une lignée renommée de maîtres ayurvédiques du Kérala. Il est devenu mon mentor et aujourd'hui encore je m'émerveille de ses enseignements.
Je suis herboriste-thérapeute accrédité et naturopathe, j’ai publié en 2010 un premier site Internet sur la médecine naturelle : projetenvie.com, et démarré à Montréal en 2013 un centre ayurvédique complet : Espace Ayurvéda, qui offre des formations professionnelles, des produits spécialisés, des consultations et une gamme de soins ayurvédiques.


Martin "Cowboy" : J'ai joins le projet en tant que directeur artistique, ce qui m'a permis d'en apprendre sur l'Ayurvéda. Je m’occupe de l’image d’Ayurvéda Révolution ainsi que de la réalisation des séries vidéo éducatives. 

Artiste visuel iconoclaste et multi-disciplinaire aux élans parfois révolutionnaires, j'ai participé à de nombreux projets de haut niveau en tant qu’artiste responsable du concept et de la réalisation graphique.

Je suis également l’auteur des Cahiers Noir, des recueils de dessins originaux à colorier et à compléter qui stimule la créativité des petits comme des grands.



Nicolas "Nico" : J'apporte mon expérience de vidéaste ainsi que mon expertise technique et technologique. Mon premier contact avec l’Ayurvéda survient alors que des amis du Pakistan me visitent et me transmettent certaines pratiques et connaissances relatives à cette science.

Ayant longuement pratiqué les 5 tibétains, je plonge dans le yoga pour quelques années. J'ai eu une carrière en informatique et médias, dont 7 ans à bâtir des infrastructures à Moment Factory et pour des clients privés dans les domaine du film et de la télévision.

J'ai quitté tout cela pour retrouver à nouveau ma passion pour la santé naturelle, m’immergeant dans des études en naturopathie et en Ayurvéda afin d’approfondir mes connaissances et mon expertise dans le domaine.


Vous aimeriez aider autrement ? 

Plus notre campagne sera vue, meilleures sont nos chances !

  • Diffusez à l'aide des outils de partage d'Indiegogo 
  • Parlez-en à des gens potentiellement intéressés
  • Suivez-nous sur Facebook
  • Souscrivez à notre infolettre ! 

Merci de votre support !

Ayurvéda
Révolution, c’est un portail
d’envergure mondiale où l’on trouve une bibliothèque d’articles de référence,
des séries vidéo éducatives et un bottin de ressources internationales 
Tout un éventail d’informations pour se soigner, se nourrir et vivre en
symbiose avec la nature, réunies en un site Internet convivial qui enseigne l’Ayurvéda, médecine traditionnelle de l’Inde.



▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬


L'Ayurvéda a été conçu à l'origine par
les anciens qui, soucieux de soutenir l'humanité dans ses migrations urbaines,
nous ont transmis comment soigner le stress engendré par ces regroupements.




Explorez dès maintenant les premiers pas d'Ayurveda Revolution !  ☞






Nous croyons en l’importance de l’autonomie pour évoluer au-delà des limites du système et faire face aux défis modernes. L'Ayurvéda renferme un potentiel énorme pour apporter des solutions à nos problèmes actuels de santé.


Plusieurs médecins et acteurs du domaine de la santé et du monde académique s'intéressent à nos enseignements et activités, tels que le Dr. Samuel Blain qui championne la médecine intégrative au Québec et l'université de Montréal qui prépare un certificat en médecine holistique.
Nous envisageons organiser un mouvement pour réunir médecine moderne et holistique et émettre des recommandations concrètes aux autorités de la santé publique du Québec.



▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬





Notre objectif : 7 000 $
Votre aide permettra l’envol d’une plateforme éducative, accessible à toute personne souhaitant améliorer sa santé et simplifier son existence. 






Équipement nécessaire

- Canon 60D
- Microphone Rode Video mic
- Trepied Jolly Gorillapod
- Monopod Manfrotto
- Tête Manfrotto
- Support pour DSLR
- Pile Protama Lp-E6
- Polaroid 144 LED camera light with variable color temp and dimmable brightness control (3200K - 5600K)


Si on dépassait notre objectif ...

Afin d’atteindre les 4 coins du globe et de développer le potentiel international de l’Ayurvéda, nous entamerons aussitôt nos démarches pour traduire le site en plusieurs langues. À commencer par :
- Traduire le site en anglais, incluant les séries vidéos
- Élaborer une carte interactive d'endroits clefs partout dans le monde




Vous contribuez à



 -  PRÉSERVER l'authenticité de l'Ayurvéda dans son essor international 


 -  CRÉER une plateforme éducative accessible aux quatre coins du globe 


 -  TRANSFORMER l'approche de la santé en Occident 




Merci à nos commanditaires

Arayuma rend accessible une gamme d’épices de très haute qualité, biologiques et équitables, ainsi qu’un lait et une eau de coco exceptionnels.
arayuma.com

Un centre ayurvédique complet offrant produits spécialisés, consultations ainsi qu’une gamme inédite de soins spécialisés.
espaceayurveda.ca


Crédits Musique ♪

Groupe Ô 
Pierre-Olivier Bolduc - Innersound (Ursa Minor)
Philippe Edwards - Tempura, chants harmoniques et de gorge

▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬●▬▬
         

On se présente :




Charlotte "Coconut" : Partisane de l'autonomie et de la liberté, je suis un jour tombée sur une femme qui a vulgarisé les ingrédients de ma crème à mains : Corinne Gouget. Ce fût la Révolution. Ma salle de bain, ma cuisine, ma vie, celle de mon chat et de tout mon entourage y ont passé : une tornade du retour aux sources et née.

L'herboristerie a toujours été pour moi la Nature qui offre ses remèdes à ses petits, mais quand j'ai découvert l'Ayurvéda, ça a pris tout son sens. Le jour où on s'est rencontrés fut le même que celui où j'ai décidé de m'y consacrer. 
Jadis, je me suis collée à plusieurs Univers différents : juridique, fiscal, artistique, langues étrangères, peinture automobile, entrepreneuriat, sciences pures, et à présent, herboristerie et Ayurvéda. 

Aujourd'hui, j'unifie ma curiosité passionnée à un mode de vie qui m'offre la liberté de suivre mes inspirations et de m'immerger dans les expérimentations quotidiennes de l'Ayurvéda et des plantes médicinales.

story:
Short Summary

I'm writing a book. That you can read. I don't have any visionary ideas on how to make cars more ecological and I'm not designing a product that revolutionizes how we consume spaghetti bolognese. I'm just writing a book. Sorry.

What We Need & What You Get

I need: I need money so I can eat and live under a roof while I write a book. And also to feed my cat (who is a jerk but still needs to eat).

You get: You will get the things that the perks widget on the side of the screen promises. 

The Impact

I will write a book. That you can read. And hopefully not starve in the process. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Feed me. Or let me live in your guest house. You have a guest house, right?

story:
Over 1,200 inspiring messages from 
more than 600 amazing women!

                                 Caroline                        Sarah                                     Hal 

Coauthors, friends and business partners Olympian Caroline Lalive Carmichael, Sarah Coleman, and Howard Alan Levin (Hal) share a love and passion for helping people, especially women! Each has found their own way to inspire individuals through coaching, training, healing and motivating others to live fuller, happier, and more meaningful lives.


Why Women’s Quotations For Successful Living?


Research conducted by Barbara Fredrickson, PH.D., revealed in her book Positivity, shows how having positive thoughts increases your well-being.

The authors discovered early on in their friendship that throughout their lives each has found inspiration and encouragement from meaningful quotations. Hal’s first book, Quotations for Successful Living, is a chronological collection of quotes from great thinkers and inspiring leaders. 

When we came together to create Inspired Life Network based on the premise of women mentoring and inspiring other women, the idea of Women’s Quotations for Successful Living was naturally conceived. 


Our Mission: 

"Create Your Extraordinary!"

We formed a company, Inspired Life Network (ILN), LLC to create unique opportunities for people who are seeking to form their own extraordinary lives. ILN has successfully hosted diverse workshops, seminars, and is creating a community of supporters. The topics addressed  include; health, beauty, fitness, nutrition, relationships, finance, and envisioning your future.

One of our goals is to combine these individual workshops into a multi-day event to be presented in or near major metropolitan areas. Then continuing to follow up with the participants after the seminars creating an online community of supporters to help people reach their individual goals!


Past Participant Reviews

“I love sharing positive thoughts with other amazing women. It’s a breath of fresh clean mountain air!”
Amiee N.

“I love that I came home from the Inspired Life Network Vision Board Party with a physical reminder of my dreams, goals and aspirations. Nothing better than starting my day with a quick view of my vision board to keep me focused”

Kara S.


How is Women's Quotations for Successful Living organized?

After reviewing tens of thousands of quotes, we selected the most uplifting.  The compilation includes inspirational messages from more than six hundred successful women including: world leaders, Olympians, physicians, athletes, actors, artists, executives, explorers, adventures, scientists, musicians, poets, and authors.

Every quote includes its source, enabling the reader to easily search the quote to gather a deeper meaning within the context of the passage. The sources include: books, interviews, speeches, newspapers, magazines and television programs, among others.




Women’s Quotations for Successful Living

Advance Reviews

“I've always looked up to confident women. This collection makes it easy to find inspiration any day of the week.” 

Julia Mancuso, Olympic gold medalist

“Powerful women are inspiration. Women’s Quotations for Successful Living will inspire, encourage, and motivate you to go after your dreams.”

Jennifer Broome, Television host, meteorologist, travel expert, and adventurer


“Everyone needs a little inspiration. Caroline, Sarah, and Hal have gathered a collection of quotes to keep you going everyday.”

Robin Schepper, Former Executive Director, Let’s Move Initiative, Office of the First Lady of the United States


Who We Are:

Caroline Lalive Carmichael, a two-time Olympian (Nagano 1998 and Salt Lake City 2002) and three-time United States National Alpine Skiing Champion, spent thirteen years on the U.S. Ski Team. A dynamic and humorous presenter Caroline presently works as a television sport commentator, philanthropist, model and is the Head Coach of alpine skiing for the Steamboat Springs Winter Sports Club. 

Sarah Coleman, grew up in Steamboat Springs and has always enjoyed an outdoor lifestyle. She graduated cum laude from the University of San Diego with a degree in communication and media. Sarah holds a personal training license from the American Council of Exercise and multiple CrossFit certifications. She understands that to live a balanced and inspire life, one must start with the basics of healthy fitness and nutritional habits.

Hal Levin , pictured with Alice Walker, is a spiritual healer certified the by National Federation of Spiritual Healers. He has met women all over the world, from impoverished mothers to world leaders. He’s seen gender inequality in nearly all societies and populations and recognizes the urgent need for more female leaders, mentors and role models. Hal thinks Women’s Quotations of Successful Living is a good place to start when looking for inspiration.


Who has funded your projects?

Thus far all funding for the research and development of the manuscript and Inspired Life Network, more than forty thousand dollars, have come from us. We did this to be free of obligations to corporate sponsors or investors so we may deliver the best possible programs and publications. 

Women’s Quotations for Successful Living is ILN’s first publication. We hope you join the Inspired Life Network adventure and support our endeavor.

What will your funds be used for?

Half will go towards paying for fulfilling the perks and promotion of Women’s Quotations for Successful Living. 

Half will go towards expanding the Inspired Life Network programs. One of our 2015 goals is to host our first multi-day event in the Boulder, Colorado.



Please press the RED contribution button below

We sincerely hope you enjoy and profit from 

Women’s Quotations for Successful Living

Please share with Family and Friends

Thank you for your support!

Thank you! 

Thank you! 

Thank you!

(There’s three of us.)


For more information please visit:

www.InspiredLifeNetwork.com

story:
Short Summary

Error and Loss is a philosophy of science and religion. It examines a fundamental,  unacknowledged error in the world-view of our age, as well as the immense loss caused by this error—a loss that deeply affects the quality of our lives. A recognition of the error opens up a fresh way of looking at the world, one which casts the current debates regarding science, religion, and atheism in a new light, since all sides share the unexamined belief that Error and Loss exposes. In the light of Error and Loss, in fact, the debate dissolves, and is replaced by a different way of conceiving of reality. 

I am a math and physics teacher who has studied religious ideas intensively (I have an MAR from Yale Divinity School and a BA in Chinese Literature from Yale College, and have studied source criticism at the Vatican University). 7 years ago I wrote the first draft of Error and Loss during a four-week retreat at the cabin in Piemonte, Italy, that is pictured on the overlay to my Indiegogo video. I am now asking the Indiegogo community to support me while I return to the cabin for a longer period of time (5 months) to bring the book into final form.

The Book

Certainly many people today experience, at least sporadically, a feeling of awe and wonder at our existence, our world, our universe. Yet this awe and wonder is in most cases qualified by a kind of deadness hovering always in the background—qualified in a way that it was not for earlier peoples. This deadening comes from the thought that our existence, our experience, and the specific objects of our experience can be explained by, or are explicable in principle, by the powerful reasonings of our natural sciences. When physicists speak of a “Theory of Everything” they express this idea in a nutshell.

Error and Loss does not at all propose erasing scientific advances or technological wonders. It does not look to return to animistic times of ignorance, superstition, and brutality, times it in no way attempts to idealize. It is not a New Age work. It is written by a math and physics teacher and its tool is transparently clear reasoning. The problem I attack in our scientific world-view is not that it employs cold reason at the expense of poetry, but that it does not reason well or consistently enough. Specifically, it makes unexamined assumptions which carry extremely significant but overlooked implications. Error and Loss pinpoints these, following out their consequences and driving them home. In particular, Error and Loss examines the implications of our belief in the independent existence of a world outside of our consciousness, arguing that these extend much further than is generally acknowledged, when acknowledged at all.

Despite its pessimistic-sounding title, Error and Loss is actually an optimistic book, one that believes that we can, if we see through the fundamental error of our age, have the best of both worlds: the triumphs of scientific understanding and the magic—not the surface magic, but the magic from the depths—that enriched the lives of earlier times in a way that we are profoundly nostalgic for. And this is not just because we would like to have more magic in our lives, but because, if seen clearly for once, that magic is there.

The Project

I have already written a first draft of Error and Loss. I wrote it during a four-week stay in the hut mentioned above. This hut is a three-hour walk from the closest village and a two-hour hike from the nearest road. There, 1500 meters above sea level, the main events of the day are the rising and setting of the sun and the convolutions of the weather. There is no electricity, and in order to get cell phone reception I have to climb for another hour up onto a ridge. I cook my meals with wood gathered from the forest floor. I eat rice and lentils and oatmeal and, in the summer months, potatoes and lettuces from a small garden.

While I have tried to work on revisions of Error and Loss in more civilized locations, these lack the isolation, quiet, and distance from technology that allow me to come into touch with what I am trying to do. I am now asking you, the Indiegogo community, to fund a longer retreat into nature, back to this hut, so that I can thoroughly revise my current draft and return with a finished product—an accessible, practical, easy-to-grasp philosophy that I believe can help remove a terrible error and make good an awful loss.

Specifically, I would like to go into the mountains on April 1st, 2015, and remain there until the end of August. (I will come down occasionally to stock up on food and other necessities.) I will have an initial version finished by July 1st, at which time I will return to civilization for a week to type it up and send a pdf for review to selected readers and to my sponsors. I will then return to the hut and put the finishing touches on the manuscript. At the end of August  I will return to civilization, type up, pdf, and bind the final version, and then send it to my sponsors.

A next step will be to find an agent and a publisher for the book, but the Indiegogo-funded project ends with the mailing of the copies by September 30. Of course I will notify all of my Indiegogo supporters upon successful publication of the book, and offer them signed copies. This step, however, is too subject to the vagaries of the publishing world to set fixed dates to, and so is not part of my concrete proposal.

I will be taking an unpaid leave of absence from my job as math and physics teacher in Hasliberg, Switzerland, in order to work on this project. I can only afford to do this if my expenses during the months away are covered: health insurance, rent on my small studio, food, travel, and the modest support I provide to my three children.

$2500 per month will cover these costs, and I am asking to be supported from April 1st till the end of August. If I can raise $12,500, this gig is on. As this is a fixed funding campaign, your contribution will be refunded to you in the event that my goal of $12,500 is not reached within 30 days. This guarantees that your money will not be used to support an only partially funded project. It's all or nothing.

Who I am

I was born in California and grew up in Massachusetts and in Switzerland. My senior project in high school was an extended essay on the scientific Weltanschauung. I attended Yale College where I studied first Philosophy and then, in order to read Zen and Taoist texts in the original, Chinese Language and Literature. After a year in Rome taking courses at the Pontificia Universitas Gregoriana I completed an academic degree (MAR) at Yale Divinity School, focusing primarily on Biblical Hebrew and the Hebrew Bible. I simultaneously earned my teaching certification in high school mathematics, which I later extended, after a two year study of physics and physics pedagogy at Smith College, to include physics as well. After teaching in Rome for two years I went on to teach math and physics for nineteen years at the Ecole d'Humanite in Hasliberg, Switzerland. I was appointed Director of the Ecole in 2009 and served in this post until summer, 2014.

I am a certified ski touring guide and licensed paragliding pilot. I have published a series of short mystery stories in Alfred Hitchcock Mystery Magazine, and am currently looking for a publisher for my novel, Double, Double, a mystery set against the controversy over who wrote Shakespeare's plays. I have three children, Joshua, Sonia, and Caleb, aged 23, 19, and 15.

My interest in the philosophies of science and religion and their relationship goes back to a moment when, as a 16-year-old walking along Sparks Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts, I was struck by the circular nature of any justification for the validity of reasoned argument. I remember this moment distinctly—the fountain at the fork between Brattle and Craigie Streets, the tall  trees in full leaf, the erratic traffic. It seemed that I had seen something that would have to change my life, something that was not quaint or academic but rather, if taken seriously, both shattering and freeing. As a freshman at Yale, reading Alan Watts and Carlos Casteneda in my free time, I studied Kant's Critique of Pure Reason in my philosophy class. It took my breath away, and I wrote a paper on it called The Necessity of Noumena.

This paper  landed me in something of a fix. My professor called me to his office, high up in a faux-gothic tower overlooking the New Haven Cemetery, and quizzed me for an hour on the points raised in my paper. Finally he came out with it: I could not possibly have written this paper. This was not only his opinion but shared by the Philosophy department faculty. He wished to know from where I had plagiarized it.

I proclaimed my innocence, was disbelieved, and left his office with roiling emotions. On the one hand, I was ecstatic to have written a paper that "no graduate student at Yale" could have written. On the other hand, I was possibly in big trouble. I returned to my room and, these being the days before personal computers, realized that I had something that might save me: the yellow legal pad with the first draft of the essay and all my subsequent deletions and insertions. I brought it to him and half an hour later received a phone call apologizing for the false accusation.

I received the paper back in the next class with an acerbic 'A' penciled in at the end and no comment. I was never given any encouragement from the Philosophy faculty, and moved over to the Chinese department, later writing my senior thesis on the wine poetry of Tao Chien. I felt, however, and still feel, whenever I read books or articles on atheism, religion, or the philosophy of science, that the author is missing an essential point, a point hidden within an assumption so basic that it is consistently overlooked. Yet exactly this point  renders the often passionate, meticulously reasoned argument next to irrelevant. It concerns our belief (or disbelief) in the independent existence of a world external to our consciousness, and forms the crux of Error and Loss.

Between The Necessity of Noumena and Error and Loss came decades in which I devoted myself to dear and practical matters, centered largely on raising my three children, teaching, and mountain climbing. While these years were full of intense moments of reflection, I never had the consistent time or leisure necessary to put my thought into anything close to a coherent form. And when I looked for my college philosophy paper several years ago, I found it had disappeared in one of our many moves. I sought it out desperately and discovered much forgotten material, but The Necessity of Noumena was not among it. I felt a lack, a thing undone, and the desire to pen my thoughts in a convincing and accessible fashion grew and grew.

About 7 years ago I took a break and retreated for four weeks to our hut in Piemonte. There, alone with the weather, the sunrises and sunsets, and the stars, I spent my days and nights putting the first draft of Error and Loss to paper. I liked it, but the scrawls and crossings-out and scribbled additions now decorating the typed manuscript testify to an immense work that still must be done to render it in final form. I am now asking you, the Indiegogo community, to give me time away up in the mountains to finish my work. I am asking you to replace enough of my teaching salary to allow me to take an unpaid leave and spend five months working on my passion in the place whose silence and mystery enriches and inspires my vision.

Risks and Challenges

I do not believe that there are significant risks facing this project. I have already written and reflected deeply on the first draft of Error and Loss, and what I want to say is clear to me. The challenge I will face is making my ideas as clear to my readers as they are to me. My pedagogical experience of over twenty years' teaching math and physics gives me a strong basis to believe that I am capable of mastering this challenge. The delight of teaching, for me, lies in figuring out the exact way to present a concept to a struggling student so that the light will go on and he or she will say, "Aha! I get it." I believe I have been very succesful at this over the course of my teaching career, and it is exactly this skill that is required to bring Error and Loss into a final, readable, "Aha! I get it!" form. I am eager for this challenge and have full confidence that I will meet it.

Meanwhile I have equal confidence in my writing ability. I have written a number of mystery stories for Alfred Hitchcock Mystery Magazine, a mass-circulation monthly that reaches a wide-ranging audience. Writing a mystery is not entirely unlike writing a philosophy—the mystery in the philosophy is deeper, but one must still present it clearly, in an exciting, accessible, and suspenseful manner, and with  a teacher's awareness for where one's invisible audience will stumble or need help.

Another challenge might be the loneliness and simplicity of the hermit's life I will be leading while working on the book. I have much experience, however, in being alone in the mountains, a situation in which I often feel my best. I stayed up in the wilderness, mostly alone, for forty days in summer 2013, without coming down to civilization even once. I find that the experience of simplicity, weather, and daily rhythms deepens the longer I stay, and I have never come down without wishing that I could have stayed up longer!

Conclusion

I realize that I am asking an awful lot when I expect you to believe that I have a new, key insight into such huge issues, an insight so valuable that, even at this late stage in the history of philosophy, it is still worth putting out into the world. But I am convinced that it is, and this conviction has grown over the years to the point where, with a limited amount of time left me on this good earth, I am conquering my fear of appearing arrogant and doing something so uncomfortable as asking for your money. Please support me! In return, I promise you a fascinating, accessible, and mind-altering read!
