story:
Story of the book

Money Chasing Behavior: Rethinking Economics is a book that brings a new theory of economics to public attention; a theory contending that we humans have made a catastrophic mistake in logic when creating our economic systems. The economy and the amount of wealth we produce comes down to our decision-making systems, and unbeknownst to us, we have inadvertently selected a system that makes us far worse off than we could be otherwise. The amount of unrealized and untapped wealth potential is orders of magnitude greater than what we have now, and it hides in plain sight waiting for us to access it. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover what this logical mistake is, why it exists unnoticed, how we could correct it, and ultimately, see how much better the world can be when we make optimal decisions.

In the book, we will break concepts down into small, easy to digest logical bits and connect them to reveal some earth-shattering facts about our current economic systems. Some of the most intriguing topics include:

  • How our current currency and financial systems force poor decision-making through a broken supply & demand structure
  • Why our money needs an expiration date to account for time
  • How progressive tax systems ensure that many people cannot afford their own labor
  • How to make capitalistic success indistinguishable from philanthropy
  • Why we should want our currency to deflate over time
  • How we could increase standards of living tenfold in a matter of years
  • And much more...

This new economic theory contends that we have never properly understood the relationship between reality, our actions, and wealth creation. While some of our preexisting beliefs can make the subject matter difficult, this book is for everyone. Economists and laypeople alike, we are all relearning the fundamentals of our reality and the economy. Any curious reader looking to expand their understanding of reality should pick up a copy and prepare to see the world from a completely new perspective.

The Book - Money Chasing Behavior: Rethinking Economics

The book is broken into three parts for an easy understanding of what we are doing wrong and why, how we would correct our mistakes, and in-depth topic discussions in a question and answer format.

Part I contains the Introduction + Chapters 1 - 7.

  • This part focuses on identifying the fundamentals of wealth creation, the economy, and where our current systems go wrong. We will cover how this logical mistake first arose, how adding currency complicates the problem further, how taxes fit into the picture, why long-held beliefs about markets are wrong and harmful, and much more.

Part II contains Chapters 8 - 12.

  • Moving on from the fundamentals covered in Part I, this part is all about policy logic; meaning, given what we know, what types of policies will new systems logically require. Leaving politics out of the conversation, we will cover policies for currencies and the environment, the roles of public and private-sector production, taxes, automation, and the roles of loans, debt, and investment.

Part III contains extrapolations on some of the more difficult subjects in a question & answer format.

  • How do youth and non-working individuals fit into the system? How does this system work with international trade? What would this system yield in terms of quality of life? And much more.
  • I have left some room to answer your questions in the book. After a few lectures, I will post on here and Twitter when we are accepting your questions.

How to Support

The goal in publishing this book is to promote understanding and discourse around how we structure our lives within economic systems, and every mind changed is a step in the right direction. There are many ways of supporting this goal, both socially and monetarily.

Financial Support

For those in a position to contribute financially, there are publishing costs that the campaign must cover before launch. Publishing with New Degree Press allows us to keep the fundraising goals to a minimum, and if you are able to support the cause with your wallet, please help get us across the finish line. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor Staff - assisting in revisions and publishing the manuscript in December 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats).
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter.
  • The Illustrations - bringing in quality visuals to help make complex topics easier. 
  • When we reach 120 pre-sale copies of the book, we will go forward with publishing. When we reach 200 pre-sale copies, we will also publish a hardcover edition. 

There are pre-order tiers (on the right of your screen) to help cover these publishing costs, and for those able to contribute financially, we are offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order the book within the campaign window:

  • A personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the book’s Introduction and some additional sections of the manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting the book’s cover
  • And updates on newly released articles and lectures that accompany the book

Any funding that exceeds the campaign’s goal will go toward additional promotion and research initiatives.

Social Support and Free Content

As the theory points out, money is just a tool, and there are many ways that anyone can support for free. Between the campaign launch and the release date, I will be releasing free content that follows the structure of the book in the form of articles and video lectures. Viewing and sharing the content is the easiest and cheapest way to contribute, specifically:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign, videos, and articles on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #MoneyChasingBehavior and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your support! I am confident that your contributions will help create better systems for a better world.

Thanks again,
Zach Ochs and the NDP Publishing Team

About the Author

Zach Ochs is a philosopher and policy researcher specializing in economic philosophy, ethics, AGI safety, metaphysics, and social ontology.

For more information you can connect with Zach on LinkedIn and Twitter at:

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically the mailing of the book to you. We have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of the book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
story_txt:
Story of the book
Money Chasing Behavior: Rethinking Economics is a book that brings a new theory of economics to public attention; a theory contending that we humans have made a catastrophic mistake in logic when creating our economic systems. The economy and the amount of wealth we produce comes down to our decision-making systems, and unbeknownst to us, we have inadvertently selected a system that makes us far worse off than we could be otherwise. The amount of unrealized and untapped wealth potential is orders of magnitude greater than what we have now, and it hides in plain sight waiting for us to access it. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover what this logical mistake is, why it exists unnoticed, how we could correct it, and ultimately, see how much better the world can be when we make optimal decisions.In the book, we will break concepts down into small, easy to digest logical bits and connect them to reveal some earth-shattering facts about our current economic systems. Some of the most intriguing topics include:

How our current currency and financial systems force poor decision-making through a broken supply & demand structure
Why our money needs an expiration date to account for time
How progressive tax systems ensure that many people cannot afford their own labor
How to make capitalistic success indistinguishable from philanthropy
Why we should want our currency to deflate over time
How we could increase standards of living tenfold in a matter of years
And much more...

This new economic theory contends that we have never properly understood the relationship between reality, our actions, and wealth creation. While some of our preexisting beliefs can make the subject matter difficult, this book is for everyone. Economists and laypeople alike, we are all relearning the fundamentals of our reality and the economy. Any curious reader looking to expand their understanding of reality should pick up a copy and prepare to see the world from a completely new perspective.The Book - Money Chasing Behavior: Rethinking EconomicsThe book is broken into three parts for an easy understanding of what we are doing wrong and why, how we would correct our mistakes, and in-depth topic discussions in a question and answer format.Part I contains the Introduction + Chapters 1 - 7.This part focuses on identifying the fundamentals of wealth creation, the economy, and where our current systems go wrong. We will cover how this logical mistake first arose, how adding currency complicates the problem further, how taxes fit into the picture, why long-held beliefs about markets are wrong and harmful, and much more.Part II contains Chapters 8 - 12.Moving on from the fundamentals covered in Part I, this part is all about policy logic; meaning, given what we know, what types of policies will new systems logically require. Leaving politics out of the conversation, we will cover policies for currencies and the environment, the roles of public and private-sector production, taxes, automation, and the roles of loans, debt, and investment.Part III contains extrapolations on some of the more difficult subjects in a question & answer format.
How do youth and non-working individuals fit into the system? How does this system work with international trade? What would this system yield in terms of quality of life? And much more.
I have left some room to answer your questions in the book. After a few lectures, I will post on here and Twitter when we are accepting your questions.
How to SupportThe goal in publishing this book is to promote understanding and discourse around how we structure our lives within economic systems, and every mind changed is a step in the right direction. There are many ways of supporting this goal, both socially and monetarily.Financial SupportFor those in a position to contribute financially, there are publishing costs that the campaign must cover before launch. Publishing with New Degree Press allows us to keep the fundraising goals to a minimum, and if you are able to support the cause with your wallet, please help get us across the finish line. The Editor Staff - assisting in revisions and publishing the manuscript in December 2020.
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats).
The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter.
The Illustrations - bringing in quality visuals to help make complex topics easier. 
When we reach 120 pre-sale copies of the book, we will go forward with publishing. When we reach 200 pre-sale copies, we will also publish a hardcover edition. 
There are pre-order tiers (on the right of your screen) to help cover these publishing costs, and for those able to contribute financially, we are offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order the book within the campaign window:
A personally signed copy of my book when I publish
Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the book’s Introduction and some additional sections of the manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting the book’s cover
And updates on newly released articles and lectures that accompany the book
Any funding that exceeds the campaign’s goal will go toward additional promotion and research initiatives.Social Support and Free ContentAs the theory points out, money is just a tool, and there are many ways that anyone can support for free. Viewing and sharing the content is the easiest and cheapest way to contribute, specifically:

story:
This book project puts spiritual activism into a new format for the future. It is about what happens when we begin to unlock and unchain all that prevents us from being human beings who are worthy of love. My book will publish in April 2020.

    Story of My Book

    Rise to the Sun: 7 Footsteps and 7 Prayers for Getting Out of Hell is for anyone who wants to get out of hell and get ‘unstuck’ from pain, whether caused by the past, or the tumultuous and impossible twenty-first century present.

    Many people believe that to ‘fix’ ourselves and the world, we need to ‘do' things differently. I believe something else: We need to see things differently. The 7 steps and 7 prayers assert a format for change: we are ready to reprogram ourselves, rather than be programmed by outside forces.

    My name is Richard J, Marks and I am the author of Rise to the Sun: 7 Footsteps and 7 Prayers for Getting Out of Hell. I wrote this book to chart and illuminate the passage to the other side of grief and hopelessness, whether it is inside your heart or about the world at large.

    The world has people marching in the streets and posting activism hashtags, but what about you? Are you free? Many of us are not any longer willing to stick with the program — the broken way. We know that old ways of doing things are not good enough. How will we get through this?

    My hope is that you will discover and desire, more than ever, to break free, retrain yourself, and find freedom.

    In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for getting out of hell! You will take a divorce from corrupted freedom. I want you to be able to shut out the false personality of your fears, shed old skins, and feel worthy of living. As inner conflict subsides, the kinder side of your character will win over the selfish self.

    In this book, you will come in contact with my 50-year global odyssey through pain and desperate experience before approaching freedom. I am joined by extraordinary people from the past and present who share personal transformations that move them towards liberation and healing with others:

    • Endurance, forgiveness, and resilience are sometimes not enough: we must say goodbye to our mounting grief and end our suicide
    • We begin to see what is within our immediate reach that leads to personal responsibility and spiritual activism
    • Every step of this book includes prayers, those beautiful phrases of human emotion and truth that help us see hope where there is little or none, to see beauty, to do for ourselves

    You will love this book if you are ready to stop suffering and paying a high price for what isn’t happening the way you want it to. We have much collective grief and trauma, but we have hope. We are in an age of healing ourselves and our planet. That means we are each called to task to release all that blocks love from flowing through us.

    The Book - 
    Rise to the Sun: 7 Footsteps and 7 Prayers for Getting Out of Hell

    My book is a non-fiction book that speaks to conscious citizens who feel stuck, for whom spiritual activism is a path for seeing the world differently for the first time. 

    The book is written in 3 parts ... which can be read several ways.

    It can be like taking a 7-day cruise with me, from embarkation to destination. Along the way, you will have time to pause, stop and think. And it can meet you wherever you are in your life, taking you from one step to the next, but not alone. Our goal is to gather together.

    Part 1: We start with “flush the psychic toilet!” The Dedication, Prologue, Getting to the First Step, and Prayer build a way of seeing the importance of reclaiming freedom.

    Part 2: The progression of the 7 steps and 7 prayers asserts a format of change: a progression from hopelessness and grief, to being worthy of love; and as you find it within, you begin sharing the inner journey of freedom with others.

    Part 3: The Epilogue, we travel our freedom. It states that “travel happens in steps, progressively, but in freedom something else happens. It is seeing the whole picture.” We may experience concepts of freedom differently in West and East, but we ultimately, seeing how we travel inwardly is the same as how we travel outwardly.

     

    About the Author

    Richard J. Marks. I am an American journalist, writer, environmentalist, communicator and filmmaker based in New York City.

    I founded Access Impact in 2013 to promote better-informed business, education and learning through the power of leading with story and making it teachable. I see it as a responsibility to help heal corporate and natural environments alike. I founded Productions 1000 in 2005 as a communications and media company for energy, environment and sustainability initiatives in  Washington DC and Beijing; prior to which I worked in large-budget feature film production, as a producer in documentary and public television, a creative executive in the National Geographic Feature Films group, and a staff journalist at CNN.

    Over the past five years, I've been on a journey to find out how all of us can stop trying to do things differently, and start to see things differently. The results have reframed the way I see the world.

    Something You Might Not Know About Me

    I revere a lot of women. It’s my thing. Especially women who have outgrown their old selves. Women of the world have shown and taught me how it’s done (and not done!). Women make up a big percentage of this book, and now you know why. They are my mainstay. Men have come a long way from the Old Boys Network I grew up with, but I’m confident that more of us are growing into being responsible fathers of the environment, and showing each other the kind of love I have mostly gotten from women. I see myself in both clubs!

    For more information you can connect with Richard at richard@solutionsseeker.com and https://www.linkedin.com/in/richardmarks1/

    What I Need & What You'll Get

    This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

    • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020
    • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
    • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
    • The Copyediting for my book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
    • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this April 2020

    I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

    • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
    • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
    • Your name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
    • Early access to the Prologue of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
    • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
    • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

             And more ...

    ​Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #Rise2theSun and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press #NewDegreePress so we can help amplify your efforts.
    • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
    • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

    The 'stretch-goal' phase supports actions to take place. Donation levels above $39 will allow:

    • Broader public outreach to take place (such as fireside chats, teaching seminars and book launches)
    • In addition to the themes of spiritual healing, there is a critical element to involving the arts (across mediums, including podcasts, audio and music )
    • Outreach to marginalized people and communities, youth/elderly, and arts communities to benefit from the lessons, stories, and prayers this book carries

      Deeply appreciated: $100/$250/$500/$1,000 

    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

    The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

    Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

    Thanks again,
    Richard J. Marks

story:
WHO ARE WE ☞

One day Rebecca wrote her friend Rebecca a message on FB the size of a novel, about how she wanted to start an indie magazine. And here we are one and a half years later launching our Indiegogo campaign. 

 

WHAT IS AWTY MAGAZINE ☞

Are We There Yet magazine is a platform for talented people to showcase their work. It’s a place for creativity and political discourse. We want to create a beautiful magazine that not only features artists, but also starts a discussion on social issues. We want people to ask themselves with every issue: are we there yet? 

The magazine consists of four zines that each tackle a different aspect of the same issue. Each year we address a new issue. This year it's feminism. The magazine features creative work, interviews, opinion pieces, and more!

 

1 ISSUE, 4 ZINES  ☞

In our first issue we tackle feminism. With a combination of visual work, interviews, poems and articles we want to establish a story on where we are at with feminism today. Each individual zine will address a different part of the feminism story. We want to figure out where we still need to go, and how to get there.

Here's a sneak peek of what to expect in the first issue:

ZINE 1 "Trendy Feminism"
– How the fashion industry takes advantage of the feminist movement
– Pseudo-feminism


ZINE 2 "Boys Don't Cry"
– Men & feminism 
– Feminism: a definition


Zine 3 "Invisible Women"
– Invisible women in media & industry
– Statistics on female roles


Zine 4 "Body Image"
– A collection of curated images
– Challenging beauty ideals

 

(Splitting the magazine into 4 zines was a recent idea, so the covers for each zine might change in the course of the design process. 

Everyone who has already purchased a perk that includes the first issue will get all four parts as soon as they become available at no additional cost. If you wish to purchase a perk now that includes the first issue you will also receive all four zines.)

 

WHY THO ☞

We have come a long way in terms of feminism, but we’re not quite there yet. AWTY Magazine’s first issue is all about highlighting the challenges feminism faces, and will have to face in the years to come. 

 

OUR GOAL ☞

We want to continue the discussion on important issues where many people think we’ve already made it. One of the many challenges that feminism faces is that, particularly in politics, people feel like it’s no longer an issue. Some ask the question: what more do they want? The truth is that in many parts of the world women and men do not have equal rights. It’s not about one side having more than the other; it’s about equality. 

 

ARE WE THERE YET & SUSTAINABILITY ☞

Being a magazine that champions social justice we feel like it is important to be a sustainable brand. This is why we try our best to be as eco-friendly as possible. Not only will the magazine itself be printed sustainably, but the shirts & bags are made with organic, Fairtrade cotton, and dyed using natural dye. All the merchandise ist screen-printed in Vienna by us, using water-based, vegan ink. All the little things such as postcards, stickers, and patches are eco-friendly as well. 

 

IT'S ALL ABOUT THE MONEY MONEY MONEY ☞

 

The money we make from our campaign will go first and foremost to funding the first issue, and fulfilling the perks for our supporters (you). Any money left over will be used to fund the issues to come. If we don’t reach our funding goal we will explore other options to fund the magazine. Any money we make on Indiegogo will still go towards funding the first issue. 

PRODUCTION

The majority of your money will go towards printing costs. We want to make a beautiful high quality, eco-friendly magazine and that ain't cheap.

PERKS

T-shirts, bags, stickers, patches, and posters don’t grow on trees. Therefore some of your money will be used to fund all that cool stuff. 

LAUNCH PARTY

You can’t launch a magazine without a launch party… well you could, but where’s the fun in that? We need some money for booze, and snacks…lots of snacks. Thanks. 

 

THE RISKS & CHALLENGES ☞

We know the creative world is already saturated with indie magazines, which is not necessarily a bad thing, however, it poses a challenge for us as a new magazine to stand out from the crowd.

What makes us different is that we are not a one issue magazine. We plan to address many different topics in the issues to come. What also makes us stand out is that we don’t just publish articles about the issue, but instead collect personal experiences on the topic at hand. We therefore include real life stories from real people. 

 

IF YOU AIN'T GOT THE MONEY ☞

If you can’t support us financially then please show your support on social media by following us on Instagram and sharing our page on Facebook. Also don't forget to check out our website and subscribe to our newsletter for regular updates!

 

From AWTY with <3

P.S. Shout out to Marlene Fally for letting us use her super dope music in our campaign video. Check out her other tunes here ☞ soundcloud.com/marlosounds

One of the many challenges that feminism faces is that, particularly in politics, people feel like it’s no longer an issue. Some ask the question: what more do they want? The truth is that in many parts of the world women and men do not have equal rights. It’s not about one side having more than the other; it’s about equality.  ARE WE THERE YET & SUSTAINABILITY ☞Being a magazine that champions social justice we feel like it is important to be a sustainable brand. This is why we try our best to be as eco-friendly as possible. Not only will the magazine itself be printed sustainably, but the shirts & bags are made with organic, Fairtrade cotton, and dyed using natural dye. All the merchandise ist screen-printed in Vienna by us, using water-based, vegan ink. All the little things such as postcards, stickers, and patches are eco-friendly as well.  IT'S ALL ABOUT THE MONEY MONEY MONEY ☞ The money we make from our campaign will go first and foremost to funding the first issue, and fulfilling the perks for our supporters (you). Any money left over will be used to fund the issues to come. If we don’t reach our funding goal we will explore other options to fund the magazine. Any money we make on Indiegogo will still go towards funding the first issue. PRODUCTIONThe majority of your money will go towards printing costs. We want to make a beautiful high quality, eco-friendly magazine and that ain't cheap.PERKST-shirts, bags, stickers, patches, and posters don’t grow on trees. Therefore some of your money will be used to fund all that cool stuff. LAUNCH PARTYYou can’t launch a magazine without a launch party… well you could, but where’s the fun in that? We need some money for booze, and snacks…lots of snacks. Thanks.  THE RISKS & CHALLENGES ☞We know the creative world is already saturated with indie magazines, which is not necessarily a bad thing, however, it poses a challenge for us as a new magazine to stand out from the crowd.What makes us different is that we are not a one issue magazine. We plan to address many different topics in the issues to come. What also makes us stand out is that we don’t just publish articles about the issue, but instead collect personal experiences on the topic at hand. We therefore include real life stories from real people.  IF YOU AIN'T GOT THE MONEY ☞If you can’t support us financially then please show your support on social media by following us on Instagram and sharing our page on Facebook. Also don't forget to check out our website and subscribe to our newsletter for regular updates! From AWTY with <3P.S. Shout out to Marlene Fally for letting us use her super dope music in our campaign video. Check out her other tunes here ☞ soundcloud.com/marlosounds

story:
At the time of her passing on May 8, 2015,

our gifted friend Temille Porter

left a legacy of love, connection and hope

for those she touched with her vibrant

smile, laughter and uplifting spirit. 

Join friends from around the globe

to honor her life and book of amazing

poetry and philosophies.  

 

 

Join us for 2 Special Events! 

 

"SPOETRY IN MOTION"

BOOK LAUNCH + SPOKEN WORD EVENT

Date:  Saturday, December 30, 2017

Venue: THE GALLERY - 1970 Columbia Street, Suite A San Diego, CA 92101

Time: 4:00-8:00 p.m

 Attire: African Inspired 

Ticket includes:  One (1) copy of Temille's Book, Wine, Appetizers & Poetry Readings.

Limited Copies Available for purchase at the Event

 

"SPOETRY IN MOTION BY THE OCEAN" 

NEW YEAR’S EVE CELEBRATION!

Date:  December 31, 2017

Venue:  THE CUVIER CLUB - 7776 Eads Ave, La Jolla, CA 92037

Time:  7:30 p.m - 12:30 a.m

Attire: Purple/Silver/Blue 

Ticket Includes:  One (1) copy of Temille's Book, Gourmet Appetizers and Dinner, Open Bar,  DJ and Dancing until Midnight, Party Favors, Champagne Toast, Ocean View.  

Sunset ceremonies prior to event on the cliffs of La Jolla

Limited Copies Available for purchase at the Event

______________________________________________________

 

DON'T MISS OUT!

We are looking to sell out FAST for both events, so order your tickets now.  

 

___________________________________________________________________________________

All additional funds raised over-and-above book production, book printing, and event costs will be donated to

CHARITY! 

Proceeds from these two events AND your generous donations will benefit a deserving charity.   Notifications will be sent via email.   

 

 

Here's the Real Deal...

 

We all continue to LOVE and miss Temille Porter.  She left a legacy of kindness and positive encouragement in all corners of the globe.   The impact of her legacy is a valuable contribution to the world and in honor of a life well lived, the planning committee - Lisa, Donna and Jo-Ann - have launched this event weekend with the strong belief that her friends will carry the torch of love forward as we honor her life.  

To pull this together, it has taken countless hours,  time spent away from work and cash money down to make this weekend happen.   Help us honor her life and art, by purchasing tickets and giving generously! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Let's make some noise about this campaign!  

  • Ask folks to get the word out on Social Media and by email.   We don't want to miss anybody! 
  • You can use Indiegogo share tools to let people know about Temille's celebration weekend. 
  • We can't wait to see you all there! 

​

Questions??   Talk to the Planning Committee:  

Lisa Arreguin:  lisaarreguin4@gmail.com (Book Production + Printing) 

Jo-Ann Hoye: sanqofa@gmail.com (Artist Coordinator and Social Media Markerting)

Donna Parnell: d.parnell@cox.net (Event & Venue Coordination)

story:
Be the designer of your life starting today!

The Smart Plan's mission is to empower you to create what for you is a meaningful, joyful and successful life. Regardless of where you are in your life, you can make your wishes and dreams a reality, rather than settling for situations that make you unhappy. 

Following simple but useful exercises you can decide if there are aspects in your life that you want to change or improve, create a precise vision of your desired outcome and act on it. This method helps you use your flexibility and creativity as well as to adopt a mindful and empathetic attitude. 

By using the Smart Planner you will organize your daily life having your goals in mind. This is how you will focus on the important tasks, stop feeling overwhelmed and stressed, be more efficient and productive and achieve significant changes in your life.

 

 

The Smart Plan includes:

GUIDED EXERCISES
The coaching exercises of The Smart Plan is a step by step process that helps you reflect on your life, identify your personal resources and talents and use your deepest wisdom and creativity to develop a vision and plan for your life staying focused and motivated.

 

FOUNDATIONAL PRINCIPLES AND GUIDELINES
The attitude of gratitude, self-compassion and consciousness are life changing principles that are quite simple to implement and can bring a huge impact in our lives. The Smart Plan encourages you to become mindful of what you’re grateful for before you start each day.

 

PRODUCTIVITY TOOLS AND TECHNIQUES
Being productive means to act towards your goals and your dreams instead of struggling with everyday tasks. Simple yet effective techniques help you achieve more focus and structure in your daily life, in order to use your time meaningfully, have less stress and be happier.

 

THE SMART PLANNER
Based on the “Three essential tasks per day” principle, the Smart Planner offers you space to prioritize and organize both your professional and personal life. The undated 24-week journal gives you the opportunity to start planing your next steps in life whenever you want. With the Biweekly review you can reflect on your achievements, recognize obstacles, consider your progress, and having your goals in mind plan the next steps towards them by keeping or adjusting your approach.

 

DESIGN 
The minimalistic design of The Smart Plan provides you with the perfect notebook-sized journal (5,10″ x 8,25″/ 13 x 21 cm), that fits into every handbag, backpack or laptop bag, so you can take it on the go. It is produced in Greece, made of top-quality materials and bound with a recycled leather cover.

 

About me

I'm Irini, a web and graphic designer, coach, writer, activist, and a lifelong learner curious about the potential and evolution of human nature. Motivated by my personal experiences and inspired by all the people I meet in my life, from people who struggle to make their way through life and those that thrive no matter their circumstances, I created The Smart Plan, a methodology to help you create the life you want.

 

Timeline

 

Shipping

You will see the shipping prices for your home country, when you back the Smart Plan project. The shipping warehouses are based in Berlin Germany, thus for customers in Germany the shipping cost is lower than the rest of the world.
The journals are going to be produced in Athens, Greece and the shipping from Athens to Berlin will take place the first days of February. That means that our customers in Europe will receive their products until the 15th of February and our customers worldwide until the end of February.

 

Risks & Challenges

In case my Indiegogo Campaign exceeds my wildest dreams and expectations and I manage a massive volume of orders, it may delay shipping times.

 

Other ways you can help

If you can't contribute in the present moment, that doesn't mean you can't support the campaign! Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools and share this project with your network! Maybe folks in your social circle could benefit from The Smart Plan!

 

Thank you

A big thank you to all YOU Doers and Makers out there for trusting The Smart Plan to experience the joy and fulfilment you crave in your life and to make a difference in the world! 
I am constantly working to improve The Smart Plan, and am always happy to receive your feedback at: info@thesmartplan.eu.

 

 

  #thesmartplan

 

 

 

Video Credits
Produced by Iliana Meintani 
Music by Gramatik (The Prophet)

A big thank you to #belraybar for their great hospitality on their premises and Eleni Panagiotopoulou for using The Smart Plan and sharing her experience about it.

 

 

The photos of the product in this campaign are from a sample and not of the final product.

Crynodeb

Mae’n amser i Gymru gael dechrau o’r newydd. Mae’r llywodraeth Lafur ym Mae Caerdydd yn dal Cymru yn ôl ac yn methu â chyflawni ei uchelgeisiau pitw ei hun – mae gan Blaid Cymru yr egni, y weledigaeth a’r syniadau i greu Cymru well.

Gallwch chi helpu drwy roi rhodd fydd yn ein galluogi ni i weithio drosoch chi a thros Gymru yn dilyn etholiad mis Mai.

Bydd yr arian sy’n cael ei godi’n cael ei ddefnyddio i dalu am nifer o trefnyddion ledled y Wlad, a bydd bob un yn chwarae rhan allweddol yn ein llwyddiant yn 2016.

Yr hyn rydym ei angen a’r hyn rydych yn ei gael

Os gwelwch yn dda rhowch be allwch chi er mwyn ein helpu i drefnu’r ymgyrch Cynulliad orau ers dechrau datganoli.

Mi fydd pob ceiniog rydyn yn ei dderbyn gennych yn cael ei wario ar helpu Plaid Cymru a Chymru i ennill yn 2016 drwy gael ymgyrch drefnus ar lawr gwlad.

Rydym eisoes wedi codi £20,000 tuag at ein ‘Cyllideb Trefnyddion’. Os gallwn godi £10,000 arall mi allwn gael effaith sylweddol – yn enwedig gan fod un aelod hael wedi addo rhoi rhodd gyfatebol o £10,000 unwaith rydym wedi cyrraedd y nod.

Y mwyaf rydym yn godi, y mwyaf y nifer o drefnwyr allwn ni fforddio.

Yr effaith

Bydd cael trefnyddion yn cynyddu’r hyn allwn gyflawni ac yn galluogi canghennau lleol i gydlynu eu gwaith a chyflawni mwy o ran ymgyrchu yn lleol, codi arian a gweithgaredd eraill fydd yn bwydo mewn i ymgyrch lwyddiannus ar gyfer etholiad Cynulliad y flwyddyn nesaf.

Ffyrdd arall gallwch helpu

Rydym yn deall nad yw’n bosib i bawb gyfrannu, ond dyw hynny ddim yn credu na allwch chi helpu:

·  Helpwch ni i ledaenu’r gair drwy wneud tipyn o sŵn am yr ymgyrch.

·  Cofiwch ddefnyddio tŵls rhannu Indiegogo! Dywedwch wrth eich ffrindiau a’ch teulu am yr ymgyrch codi arian.

Am fwy o wybodaeth cysylltwch â post@plaid.cymru neu ewch i ymweld â’n gwefan www.plaid.cymru



Short Summary

It’s time for a fresh start for Wales.  The Labour Welsh government is holding Wales back and is unable to even achieve its own meagre ambitions – Plaid Cymru has the energy, the vision and the ideas to make Wales work.

Play your part in moving Wales forward by giving a donation that will enable us to work for you and for Wales after May’s election.

The money raised will be used to fund a number of organisers across the nation, all of whom will play a key part in our success in 2016.

What We Need & What You Get

Please give what you can to help us organise the best Assembly election campaign since the beginning of devolution.

Every single penny we receive from you will go towards helping Plaid Cymru and Wales win in 2016 by having organised campaigns on the ground.

We’ve already raised £20,000 towards our ‘Organisers Fund’.  If we can raise another £10,000 we will be able to make a huge impact – particularly as one generous member has promised to match this with another £10,000. 

The more we can raise, the more organisers we can fund.

The Impact

Having organisers will help increase capacity and allow local branches to co-ordinate activity and accomplish more local campaigning, fund raising and activities which will all help to feed into a successful campaign for next year’s Assembly election.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

·  Help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

·  Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! And let your friends and family know about our crowdfunding campaign.

For more information, please contact post@plaid.cymru or visit our website www.thepartyof.wales

story:
UPDATE

We've reached our funding goal, but you can still order your copy of "Godless Paganism" and take advantage of the other perks. All profits over and above our funding goal will go to The Wild Hunt's fall funding campaign!  If we collect $500 over our goal, we can place a graphical ad for HumansiticPaganism.com at the WildHunt.org.

OVERSEAS SHIPPING IS NOW AVAILABLE FOR ALL PERKS.

What This Is All About

We are gathering writings of atheist and other non-theistic Pagans for publication of the first ever collection of writings by and about non-theistic Pagans. 

“But ‘atheist Pagan’ is a contradiction in terms!” Maybe you have heard this or something like it before. Maybe you are an atheist Pagan and you’ve kept it a secret because you thought you were the only one. The truth is that atheist Pagans exist! Together with other non-theistic Pagans, like humanists, naturalists, animists, pantheists, and Gaians, we are part of a growing and vibrant community within the larger Pagan umbrella. 

Non-theistic Pagans are Pagans who do not believe in the literal existence of personal gods. But beyond that definition, "non-theistic Pagan" may refer to a variety of theological orientations. For some, gods play no role in their spiritually at all. For others, gods are seen as mere metaphors or as numinous archetypes. Some are pantheists or animists. Most non-theistic Pagans share a love of Pagan ritual and myth and experience a deep sense of awe or reverence in nature. 

What We Need 

  • $687 ($624 publishing costs + $63 platform and transaction fees)
  • Essays and articles on the meaning and practice of non-theistic Paganism. Poetry, photography and other art is also welcome. Send your to humanisticpaganism@gmail.com
What You Get
  • All contributions of $20 or more will get a copy of "Godless Pagans: Voices of Non-Theistic Pagans" hot off the press (hard copy plus ebook/pdf).
  • All contributions of $45 or more will their name or the name of the organization of their choice listed on the acknowledgments page of the book AND a copy of "Godless Pagans: Voices of Non-Theistic Pagans" hot off the press (hard copy plus ebook/pdf).
  • All contributions of $100 or more will get a graphical ad (165x165) at HumanisticPaganism.com linking to the website or blog of their choice AND their name or the name of the organization of their choice listed on the acknowledgments page of the book AND a copy of "Godless Pagans: Voices of Non-Theistic Pagans" hot off the press (hard copy plus ebook/pdf).
Your ad could go here:

(If we do not reach our goal, your contribution will go toward a more limited publishing run and you will still get your perks.)

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Send your articles and essays about non-theistic Paganism to humanisticpaganism@gmail.com for consideration for inclusion in the book. It can be something you have shared before or something new. Poetry, photography, and other art is also welcome.
  • Share this on Facebook and other social media.

UPDATE

We've reached our funding goal, but you can still order your copy of "Godless Paganism" and take advantage of the other perks. All profits over and above our funding goal will go to The Wild Hunt's fall funding campaign!  If we collect $500 over our goal, we can place a graphical ad for HumansiticPaganism.com at the WildHunt.org.
OVERSEAS SHIPPING IS NOW AVAILABLE FOR ALL PERKS.

What This Is All About
 We are gathering writings of atheist and other non-theistic Pagans for publication of the first ever collection of writings by and about non-theistic Pagans. 
“But ‘atheist Pagan’ is a contradiction in terms!”  Maybe you have heard this or something like it before. Maybe you are an atheist Pagan and you’ve kept it a secret because you thought you were the only one. The truth is that atheist Pagans exist! Together with other non-theistic Pagans, like humanists, naturalists, animists, pantheists, and Gaians, we are part of a growing and vibrant community within the larger Pagan umbrella. 
Non-theistic Pagans are Pagans who do not believe in the literal existence of personal gods. But beyond that definition, "non-theistic Pagan" may refer to a variety of theological orientations. For some, gods play no role in their spiritually at all. For others, gods are seen as mere metaphors or as numinous archetypes. Some are pantheists or animists. Most non-theistic Pagans share a love of Pagan ritual and myth and experience a deep sense of awe or reverence in nature. 
What We Need 


$687 ($624 publishing costs + $63 platform and transaction fees)
Essays and articles on the meaning and practice of non-theistic Paganism. Poetry, photography and other art is also welcome. Send your to humanisticpaganism@gmail.com


What You Get

 
All contributions of $20 or more will get a copy of "Godless Pagans: Voices of Non-Theistic Pagans" hot off the press (hard copy plus ebook/pdf).
All contributions of $45 or more will their name or the name of the organization of their choice listed on the acknowledgments page of the book AND a copy of "Godless Pagans: Voices of Non-Theistic Pagans" hot off the press (hard copy plus ebook/pdf).
All contributions of $100 or more will get a graphical ad (165x165) at HumanisticPaganism.com linking to the website or blog of their choice AND their name or the name of the organization of their choice listed on the acknowledgments page of the book AND a copy of "Godless Pagans: Voices of Non-Theistic Pagans" hot off the press (hard copy plus ebook/pdf).

Your ad could go here:


(If we do not reach our goal, your contribution will go toward a more limited publishing run and you will still get your perks.)

Other Ways You Can Help  
Send your articles and essays about non-theistic Paganism to humanisticpaganism@gmail.com for consideration for inclusion in the book. It can be something you have shared before or something new. Poetry, photography, and other art is also welcome.

Share this on Facebook and other social media.

Resumen

 

Los colaboradores financian ideas que los apasionan y a la gente en la que confían. Estas son algunas cosas que puedes hacer en esta sección:

 
     
  • Preséntate y cuenta tu historia.
    •  
  • Describe brevemente tu campaña y explica por qué es importante para ti.
    •  
  • Expresa la magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores.
    •  
 

Recuerda, sé breve pero personal. Pregúntate: si alguien dejara de leer aquí, ¿estaría listo para colaborar?

 
 
 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Presenta más detalles:

 
     
  • explica cuánto financiamiento necesitas y a dónde va. Sé transparente y específico, la gente necesita confiar en ti para que quiera financiarte.
    •  
  • Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!
    •  
  • Describe a dónde van los fondos si no logras la meta total.
    •  
 
 
 

El impacto

 

Explica tu campaña en mayor detalle y cuéntale a la gente la diferencia que hará su contribución:

 
     
  • explica por qué tu proyecto es valioso para el colaborador y para el mundo.
    •  
  • Describe tu historial de éxito en proyectos como este (si lo tienes).
    •  
  • Haz que la gente lo sienta real y genera confianza.
    •  
 
 
 

Riesgos y desafíos

 

Las personas valoran la transparencia. Sé abierto y destácate al ofrecer perspectivas sobre los riesgos y obstáculos que puedes enfrentar en el camino hacia lograr tu meta.

 
     
  • Comparte lo que hace que te destaques para superar estos obstáculos.
    •  
  • Describe tu plan para solucionar estos desafíos.
    •  
 
 
 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:

 
     
  • pídele a la gente que difunda tu campaña y que genere eco.
    •  
  • Recuérdales que usen las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.
    •  
 
 

Y eso es todo.

story:
The Story

Truth be told, JJ Rowan and Nate Logan have never met. Yes, you read that right.

Thanks to poetry, we started crossing paths on the Internet about a decade ago. Nate published an early poem of JJ's in Spooky Boyfriend, an online journal that was a precursor to Spooky Girlfriend Press. Some years later, JJ published Nate in Tarratine, a magazine she co-published with an arts collective in central Maine, and invited him to read via Skype at one of their events. We kept (virtually) bumping into each other. We shared work and conversation. Correspondence turned into collaboration.

Fast forward: 100 sonnets and a chapbook publication later, we're going on tour.

The idea came out of some very exciting news: Nate's first full-length book of poems would be published by Magic Helicopter Press this fall! He wanted to do a reading tour! It probably started with JJ making a joke about tagging along. Joking turned into planning. It was high time for a face-to-face.

So...our faces officially go on tour in a month!

The Plan

Here's the deal: this is an entirely self-funded and self-organized tour. We're hoping to offset the cost of the tour by sharing our tour experience and some extra special publication goodies with you. In mid-October, we'll hit the road to read in the following cities (now with updates!):

  • Friday, Oct. 12 (with Peter Davis) @ 6:30pm
    Books & Brews (Mass Ave.)
    Indianapolis, IN

  • Saturday, Oct. 13 
    Badger Castle House Reading (Time TBA)
    Grand Rapids, MI
    *contact us for more info!*

  • Monday, Oct. 15 @ 6pm
    Sherman Perk Coffee Shop 
    Milwaukee, WI 

  • Wednesday, Oct. 17 (it's a double feature!)
    Boneshaker Books @ 5pm
    Eat My Words! @ 7pm
    Minneapolis, MN

  • Friday, Oct 19 (Nate IRL & JJ in spirit!) @ 7pm
    The Spirit Room
    Fargo, ND

We've set this campaign at Indiegogo's minimum of $500 and would love to reach that goal. These funds will go directly to practical tour expenses, including

  • Car Rental
  • Gas
  • Lodging
  • JJ's Airfare from Oregon to Indiana

We'll cover our own impractical tour expenses (which mostly include JJ's caffeine habit and Nate's pumpkin obsession). 

So! We're offering two ways to support us:

  • The Tour Experience: Perks include video updates from the road and broadside postcards featuring collaborative sonnets and personal messages from us, sent to you during the tour.
  • The Publication Experience: Perks include publications by either (or both) of us, signed for you with an exclusive Bearface bookmark (Bearface is JJ's incredible cat), sent to you after our time on the road (late October/early November).
  • Bonus: Whether you donate funds or give us a boost with a share, we'll be keeping a tour diary that we'll share with everyone (more on that as our departure date approaches)!

The Misc.

If you can and want to help support us with cold hard cash, great! We endlessly appreciate you and hope our humble perks help get that across. If you'd like to help without the dollar sign, we could absolutely use it in these ways:

  • Spread the word! Sharing our campaign on social media, via email, or word of mouth will help us get funded even if you can't offer any dollars.
  • Offer advice! Pearls of wisdom from your own poetry tours are welcome, as are insights into the areas we'll travel through. Must-try local foodstuffs? Awesomely weird attractions? Send 'em our way.
  • Host us! As we finalize the specifics of our readings, we may be looking for folks who host reading series, have contacts at venues, or can offer a place to crash. Drop us a line.
  • Host us in the future! While we're sticking to parts of the Midwest this time, we're scheming for possible future tours. Let us know where you'd like to see us read.
  • Attend a reading! Do you live in or around one of the cities listed? Let us share some poetry with your ears! Let us give you an actual high five! Stay tuned for details.

Wow! Thanks for reading this far! Here's some info about our recent work, including links to some publications and reviews:

  • Magic Helicopter Press will release Nate's first full-length collection, Inside the Golden Days of Missing You, in early October 2018
  • where is the river just published six new sonnets from Nate & JJ's collaborative project
  • Shirt Pocket Press published JJ & Nate's chapbook of collaborative sonnets, mcmxciv., in January 2018 and JJ's chapbook the selected jesus in 2015
  • At Agape Editions, Jennifer MacBain-Stephens just reviewed mcmxciv. this month
  • At Chapbook Chat, Nancy Chen Long reviewed mcmxciv. and interviewed Nate & JJ in February 2018
  • The Rush published a new poem by Nate this past June
  • The Hunger & phoebe published new poems by JJ this past May
  • Locofo Chaps published chapbooks by both in 2017: JJ's so-called weather and Nate's Post-Reel

From our sonnet-shaped hearts to yours,
J+N

story:
Hogy ki is az a költőMATA?

Egy verselő robot, akitől ha kérsz egy témát, ő kreál rá gyorsan egy verset. Vagyis... valami versnek tűnő valamit. Igazából az lesz a legjobb, ha beleolvasol a blogjába:

koltomata.tumblr.com

A költőMATA 2017. áprilisában született és egy éves létezése alatt ~5000-en követték be a tumblr közösségből, illetve a Meglepetés magazin heti 300 ezer olvasója is immár imádhatja. Mondhatjuk, hogy népszerű, (már ahhoz képest, hogy irodalomról van szó és nem ledér hölgyek képeiről. Azokat többen követik. Állítólag.)

költőMATA műveit legtöbben mobilon, tableten, vagy számítógépen olvassák, ám egyesek nem átalkodnak kinyomtatni, magukkal vinni a fürdőkádba, sőt falra is kitenni egy-egy nekik tetsző alkotást. Ők a reneszánsz olvasók, akik ellenállnak a képernyő múló világának. Ők azok, akik rendszeresen nyaggatják a szerzőt, adassa már ki könyvben is a műveit.

Itt az idő!

Tegyünk egy próbát, lássuk lenne-e, aki megvenné ezt a könyvet. Ha legalább 200 vásárlás születik, akkor kénytelen leszek elballagni egy nyomdába, kinyomtatni a megfelelő példányszámot, dedikálni, majd feladni őket a Postán. 

Miért itt? Miért nem egy könyvesboltban?

  1. Ezt az Indiegogo kampányt összeállítottam pár óra alatt. Egy kiadót rávenni hosszas könyörgéssel, hogy foglalkozzon a művekkel, az időrabló és megalázó procedúra. Meg még maradi is.
  2. Olcsóbb lesz így a könyved. Nincs rajta a kiadói és terjesztői, stb. költség
  3. Csipkebokor vessző.
  4. hja az a "kettő".

És mi van, ha közben megkeres egy kiadó? Mi lesz akkor a könyvemmel?

Nem hiszem, hogy ennél jobb ajánlatot kapok. Ha pedig mégis, akkor kikötöm, hogy az itteni vevők kapjanak belőle egy példányt. Szóval mindenképp lesz könyved.

És ha nem jön össze 200 vevő?

Először is lesz egy szomorú estém. Van egy jó vörösborom erre az esetre. Aztán visszakapod a pénzed és veszel belőle egy másik szerzőtől verseskötetet, ami nem lesz ilyen jó persze, de legalább be tudod vinni a kádba.

És ha 1000 vásárlás születik?

Haha, ja persze.

Tök sok hely maradt még itt alul! Mihez kezdesz vele?

Például beteszek egy videót. Papp Réka Kinga elénekelte az egyik, mára hírhedt versemet és marhajó lett.

Miután ennek politikai töltete is volt, így az index meg a 444 is lehozta ezt a videót, de amúgy ritkán politizálok. Tényleg. Nézd meg:

koltomata.tumblr.com

story:
"A lovely story that addresses loss, with beautiful illustrations! I love the cast of characters, and the discussion questions and activities offered at the back of the book. The open-ended nature of the ending allows children to interpret it in the way that makes sense from their own experience."
Terri Allison, Moonlit Consulting, Former Executive Director/Storyteller Children's Center

Thank you for joining us!

The team at Seven Seas Press is passionate about the well-being of children. We are mothers ourselves, and have devoted much of our personal and professional lives towards helping to create a world where today's and tomorrow's children can not only survive, but thrive.

This campaign for The Little Blue Dragon addresses the need for inspiring and hopeful stories to counterbalance the often challenging world our children face every day.

We pay close attention to world events that are affecting children, and connect with international and national groups who are providing support. We partner with them to get our books to the children and their caregivers in a timely way.

And we want to partner with individuals like you, who would also like to help.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal of $5000 will ensure that children both known and unknown to our supporters will be able to hear The Little Blue Dragon's tale, and find hope and inspiration to face whatever challenges have come their way.

We are excited to be able to donate books on behalf of our supporters via dedicated helpers on the front lines, who can deliver books to these children we may not know personally but hear about on the news, and for whom we feel deep compassion.

Donations directly for operating expenses will allow us to devote more time to these goals and expand our reach. It will also allow us to translate the books into other languages, in order to target specific parts of the world in need.

 

"I love it! The images are beautiful and innovative. The story is tender, engaging, and so relevant. Children will be inspired by The Little Blue Dragon's courageous journey, and how she found a wonderful new friend as well as her own voice along the way."  Sarah Clark, Capacitar International Facilitator

 

The Impact

Many of us feel helpless when we hear about the struggles so many of the world's children face today. Let us do the legwork for you so you can reach out a helping hand.

Our books have been donated through The Red Cross, Crete for Life, Hospice, The Boys and Girls Clubs, as well as many other organizations, schools and libraries, and have been sent to children at Sandy Hook, Hurricane Harvey and California Fire disaster relief centers, the Immigration Detention centers at the US/Mexico Border, and more.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone is in a position to help with dollars, but that doesn't mean we can't all still help. Please help us get the word out by sharing our campaign with other caring humans like you! And make it easy on yourself by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!

story:
The Story of My Book

The Psyche Behind Sci-Fi: the Power of Point of View is an educational think piece that teaches you what point of view in fiction writing is and how it can affect the sci-fi reading and writing experience.

My name is Kristin Smith and I am the author of The Psyche Behind Sci-fi: the Power of POV. I wrote this book because I want to share what I’ve learned about fiction writing.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that point of view influences every aspect of storytelling. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for point of view. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you learn what each point of view has to offer.

In this book, you'll learn about the formal and creative applications of point of view. You'll see things such as...
  • Short essays on how perspective shapes classic pieces such as Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen, The Turn of a Screw by Henry James, “Everyday Use” by Alice Walker, and more .
  • Original short stories and sci-fi pieces in each point of view.
  • A sneak peek into the plot of my (other) upcoming book Incipience
You will love this book if you are interested in learning more about point of view writing, are curious about fiction writing craft, and want to learn the formal/academic applications of point of view.

The Psyche Behind Sci-Fi: the Power of Point of View is a creative nonfiction book that speaks to novice writers and sci-fi fans who want to learn more about writing and the intricacies of sci-fi in a new way.
 

The Psyche Behind Sci-Fi: the Power of Point of View


The book is written in two parts.

Part one contains the introduction and chapters 1-5. These chapters teach you the four types of first person point of view. In this section, you’ll learn about the types of narrators, plot elements, and tones associated with the first and second person perspectives. 

Part two contains chapters 6-8. Unlike the first and second person points of view, third person perspectives don’t have specific narrator types, so this second section instead dives into the scope of the third person perspectives and the insight these points of view. 


 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.
 
  • I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!
 

About the Author


Kristin Smith is currently a senior at Georgia State University. As a participant in GSU’s dual degree program, she will be graduating with her Bachelors of Arts in English Literature in Spring of 2021 before earning her Masters of Arts in English Literature in Spring of 2022. She is currently a member of Georgia State University Library’s Board of Advocates and the library’s Student Advisory Committee.

Kristin wrote this book because she thinks that point of view does not get as much attention as the other literary elements do. She decided to write The Psyche Behind Sci-Fi: the Power of Point of View because she wanted to highlight the importance of point of view and to share what she’s learned about it throughout college at an affordable price.

When she’s not writing or working on homework, Kristin enjoys volunteering with her local Kingdom Hall, reading Webtoons/comics and novels, and binge (re)watching Star Trek with her dad. 

For more information, you can connect with Kristin Smith via email  (bloggingwithkristinsmith@gmail.com), Instagram (@kristinscifismith), and Twitter (@kristinwittwois).
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #thepowerofpov and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
  • Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!


Thanks again!


Kristin Smith

story:
We are Bocadillos, a full service catering company and school meal program based in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

We began in 2009 by selling breakfast burritos every morning to finance and promote our business. Currently, we are feeding up to 500 children a day, 2500 meals per week, 5 days a week. We are blessed with adding 3 more schools this coming August, serving up to 5000 meals a week.

Without the assistance of loans or credit cards, we purchased one short school bus last August to deliver our food to the schools we serve. However, being that it is an older bus, there are important mechanical and aesthetic repairs that need to be done. We not only need to have our bus safe for our staff but we also want it to be noticeable to our community. We would like everyone to know that our bus is "THE" bus that serves Albuquerque charter schools the freshest and healthiest foods available. Adding three additional charter school contracts this year, we will also need to purchase another short bus to get our food to all 6 of our schools hot and on time.

This is why we ask for your help. With your contribution, we can continue to transport and serve healthy foods as well as promote our local economy. Because we buy the majority of our fresh food from local farmers and vendors, we are thrilled and grateful that we can impact Albuquerque's youth, economy and community in such a positive way. With transportation covered, our plan is to then expand our business to include educating children in ways that create healthier, more sustainable lifestyles. 

Thank you for your interest in what Bocadillos' campaign is all about. 

For more information, visit our website www.bocadillosnm.com

story:
Hi, I'm Ken Gire, and I want to share a little about this campaign---what it is, what it means to me, and what you can do to help.

The goal of the campaign is to fund the completion of my novel, titled "Centurion." I'm in the final stages of writing it, but I need help completing it. When I'm finished, I will write the screenplay. If additional funds come in, I will relocate to Los Angeles to meet with producers and directors in hopes of getting the story made into a feature film.

I'm passionate about this! And determined!

Here is what is so exciting. If the story does become a film, you will be sitting in some darkened theater, watching the final scene as you wipe away a tear. And, as the credits roll, you will take a breath and say to yourself, "I had a part in that. Me. I helped put that story on that screen."

And likely another tear will come.

"Centurion" is a beautiful story. It is about finding true love, and losing it; about finding true faith, and losing it, too: about finding one's true self, and losing that as well. Only in the end, discovering that all, in a moment, can be found again. And all, if only for a moment, can be embraced again.

The story has stirred me deeply, and I am so excited to be able to share it with you. I am keeping a daily blog about the writing, and I would love for you to follow its progress. The link is: centurionbykengire.wordpress.com.

When you get there, click "Overview of the Story," and you will find a synopsis. On the "Home" page you will find posts that include the first three chapters of the book, along with journal entries that allow me to share something of the writing process.

I've loved doing the blog, and I hope you will enjoy peeking behind the scenes of a writer at work.

The funding I need to finish the novel and write the screenplay is $10,000. Not a lot. That's 166 people choosing the $60 perk, which gets you three books in return, one of which is the novel, all of which are signed.

If you're an aspiring writer and need help learning the craft of writing, there's a $10 perk that will give you that help. And for someone who is a little farther along in their writing, there's a perk for some individual mentoring. 

You'll love being a part of this. Help if you can. If you can't, please encourage someone you know to help. 

The clock is ticking.

But you, you have the opportunity to step into this moment in time and make a difference.

Certainly you will make a difference in this writer's life.

And possibly a difference in the world.

story:
Nuestra historia.

En el 2003  la Librería Barco de Papel abrió sus puertas cerca de la popular Avenida  Roosevelt. Lo que empezó como una librería más enfocada en los libros infantiles se fue adaptando a las necesidades de su público y poco a poco fue adquiriendo su propia identidad. Y es que ese pequeño pero peculiar espacio ha resultado ser un lugar esencial para la cultura en nuestra ciudad, un espacio que lo ha dado todo. La Librería Barco de Papel es algo especial, forma ya por mérito propio el honor de ocupar un lugar en la historia cultural hispana de esta ciudad de Nueva York.


La Librería además de ser un establecimiento de venta de libros en español  y en  inglés, es un lugar alternativo  que durante diez años se ha convertido en el punto de encuentro de artistas, poetas y escritores. Barco de Papel ha acogido  también diferentes propuestas culturales como programas de teatro para jóvenes (apoyados por las escuelas del área), cuenta-cuentos  para niños,  tertulias, micrófonos abiertos, talleres de poesía y literatura entre otros.  La librería es una voz para los jóvenes artistas contemporáneos y  los ya establecidos en la comunidad de Nueva York.

En este contexto con su ayuda permitirá que este espacio siga siendo  un polo de desarrollo del conocimiento en nuestra ciudad. 


NOW IN ENGLISH:

In 2003 Barco de Papel bookstore opened near the popular Roosevelt Avenue in Queens, New York.  What began as a bookstore more focused on children's books was adapted to the needs of their audience and gradually took on its own identity.  That little but quirky space has proved to be an essential place for culture in our city, a space that has given everything.  Barco de Papel bookstore is something special in its own way and has the honor to be a place of the cultural history of the Hispano-American culture in New York.


This place besides selling books in Spanish and English is an alternative place that for ten years has become the meeting point for artists, poets and writers. Barco de Papel has also hosted various cultural programs for youth like theater (supported by area schools), children's storytelling, discussions, open mic, poetry workshops and literature. The bookstore is a voice for young contemporary artists and those already established in the community of New York. 

It is our goal that Barco de Papel will remain a pillar of knowledge, and one day a landmark, that celebrates and preserves the Latino Culture in our community and city.



****************************************************************************************************************


 En la LIBRERÍA BARCO DE PAPEL se ha comenzado una transición planificada de nuestro modelo de operación actual a una organización Non- profit, también conocida como organización  sin fines de lucro.

Si bien de estos conceptos se puede aprender y usarse con eficacia, sin duda, reconocemos que con el modelo Profit (lucrativo), hemos enfrentado muchos retos y un ambiente de constantes restricciones de recursos.

Barco de Papel, has started a planned transition from our current operating model to a Non-profit organization. We undoubtedly recognize that with the profit model we have faced many challenges and an atmosphere of constant resource constraints.  We need to adopt a single model that fits correctly to our work. While these concepts can be learned and used effectively, your help is essential in this transition to CENTRO CULTURAL BARCO DE PAPEL.ORG

Please take a minute of your time and with your donation, let us continue our mission to foster and perpetuate a high level of culture in New York.



http://libreriabarcodepapelny.com/

story:
I am a heritage breeds farmer in Northeast Georgia raising rare breeds of sheep, rabbits, and hogs. The American Guinea Hog was recently upgraded from Critical to Endangered by The Livestock Conservancy. Just one decade ago, it was on the brink of extinction. When I discovered the breed, I wanted to find out as much as possible about it, but there is very little information out there. This type of swine is unique in many ways, and it must be cared for and raised differently, too. As an educator and researcher in my prior career, I wanted to learn and share this information to other homesteaders like me.


I will be interviewing current and previous breeders of the American Guinea Hog, as well as chefs who promote its succulent meat and lard. I'm also contacting elders who remember the hog from an earlier time. I will collect their stories, determine themes and patterns, and share the information in book form.  The end product will actually be a series of three books:

Hogs with Heart: Stories and Care of the American Guinea Hog

Historical Hogs with Heart: The Foundation American Guinea Hogs

Succulent Pork and More: The Incomparable Taste and Resourcefulness of America's Homestead Hogs

To find out more about our mission and activities on the farm, you may want to check out our media page. We have recently been featured in September's Acres, USA, in Georgia Organic's The Dirt, and will be on a Podcast in November with Permaculture Voices. My first interview for Permacuture Voices was Episode 10.


I am passionate about preserving the American Guinea Hogs for future generations to enjoy. These books will contribute knowledge that will help them continue to thrive and once again dot the landscape of rural America and even urban farms, as zoning allows. How many crowd funding campaigns help protect future food sources, connect people with their food, and save a livestock breed for future generations? By participating in this project, you can truly make a difference!

Funding Goals

  • I currently have several important interviews completed. Each one is about 90 - 120 minutes long. Even at a competitive rate, transcribing these recorded interviews will cost me $68-90 per interview. If I meet my goal, I will have funds to transcribe about 20 interviews after deducting indiegogo, credit card, and PayPal fees.
  • I plan to have future fundraisers to cover costs of additional interviews, book cover art, printing, and editing. Any additional funds raised in this fundraiser will be applied to these essential needs. 
  • If I do not meet my goal, I will not be able to transcribe as many interviews, and the book project will be delayed.
  • I am offering perks very unique to Broad River Pastures that you will not find anywhere else. There is a wide range of perks to meet most budgets. Thank you for supporting our cause!

The Impact You can Make

Your support to this project will make a huge difference to me, to the American Guinea Hog, and to current and future stewards of this incredible heritage animal.

  • The American Guinea Hog has unique genetic traits and is least related to most other breeds of hogs. If the hog is lost, so are its unique characteristics.
  • This hog must be raised differently than other breeds, but there is little information out there to help breeders.
  • Stories of the hogs and how they were saved from extinction have not been written down and shared with a wider audience. Their stories are important and worthy of preservation.
  • My previous fundraiser, https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-save-he..., provided me with seed money to purchase, house, and fence in our initial herd of American Guinea Hogs. Just thirteen months later, we were blessed with 37 piglets from our first 5 farrowings! My former campaign perks were delivered promptly with only a few delays. My backers were appreciative and very supportive. Photos of our hogs are available at our website. I have a good track record with this type of fundraiser.

Risks & Challenges

At this point I do not know when my writing project will be finalized in book form. The modest goal of this particular campaign will not get me to that point, but will go a long way in amassing the raw interview material in transcribed form that will allow me to begin analysis and organization into a book.

  • My history of completing a doctoral dissertation from 1996-2004 indicates that I do not give up on long term research projects and have the ability to synthesize interviews into a readable form.
  • I will repeat fundraising efforts as needed in order to keep this project going without putting myself in debt for the project.
  • Perks will be distributed on time prior to writing the book. My intention is to complete my first book in 2015.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't commit cash at this time? That's okay!

  • You can still help by linking to the campaign on your social media tools! It doesn't cost a cent to share!
  • Please note that if you do make a contribution, funds paid via PayPal will be available to me immediately. This means that I can go ahead and dispense perks I have on hand before the fundraiser even ends. It also means that I can begin my transcription work right away. I don't believe that you need a PayPal account to make a payment to PayPal using your credit card. Funds paid with a credit card but not through PayPal will not be received until mid December.
