story:
Short Summary

"only now are we able to fully comprehend the Power Stations past, a legacy of environmental damage that we have to acknowledge if we are ever to transform it".

Those final words sum up the drive behind the initial idea to write such a book.

Check out our short presentation here Battersea Flower Station.

I've been producing kids TV programmes, ads and sites for many years.

Many of my ideas have ended up on screen for CITV, CBBC, Nickelodeon, Disney et al. I'm a published author, although nothing in this space as yet.

Battersea Flower Station has been a long time in the making, here is the potted history.

Whilst living in Battesea ten or so years ago I was working for a TV production company coming up with ideas for childrens TV programs for the likes of CBBC, CITV, Nickelodean et al.

Passing this iconic A Grade II-listed Art Deco masterpiece, Europe's largest brick building at least twice a day, made me think, not just about the years of pollution and the many failed ideas that developers had to transform it.

As a famous London landmark the Power Station featured in Hitchcock and Monty Python films, as well as various episodes of Doctor Who. Probably most memorable is its place on the cover of Pink Floyd's 1977 album 'Animals'. Since its days producing electricity for London stopped in the early 80's, the site and station itself has become more and more derelict.

During that time I drafted a short story, a story that portrayed the damage, survival of the pollution and evolution... a lesson and a positive message for all to learn from.

Battersea Flower Station is a short story being published as a fun, eductional childrens book with a strong environmental message.

The message is great for kids and parents alike, it's cool, topical and very London! (Boris take note!)

Finally the funds to get the much loved power station transformed into Battersea Flower Station are a fraction of any of those failed schemes over the last thirty years...and the plan...much more achievable!

What We Need & What You Get

The draft was written quite a few years ago, it has been refined over the years.

The funding is required for -

Proof reading, editing and enhancing to ensure that it appeals to a broad target audience in the correct tone of voice.

Illustration - anything you see here has been cobbled together by me. I'm a writer but not an illustrator, we need a good illustrator (hint hint!) to bring the words to life for the target audience.

As it has a stong environmental message we want it to be published on a Print-on-demand platform...and preferably on recycled paper (although this may be cost prohibitive for the first edition).

Unique Perks

€5 - gets you big love, plus we'll follow/like/love/link you on any one of your requested social media platforms (Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, LinkedIn, Pinterest, MySpace, Google Plus+, Reddit, StumbleUpon, Delicious, digg or any other place you like to hang out)

€15 - gets you one of the first copies off the press, including free international delivery

€25 - gets you a signed copy, including free international delivery

€50 - gets you a signed copy and 5 "Read it" badges plus 1 copy for your local library

€125 - gets you 2 signed copies, 10 "Read it" badges and a "Read it" T-shirt (which once having read the book you'll find pretty funny!) & 2 copies for your local libraries

€250 - gets you 4 signed copies, 20 "Read it" badges, a "Read it" T-shirt & 2 copies for your local libraries or schools

€500 - gets you 5 signed copies, 20 "Read it" badges, a "Read it" T-shirt & 4 copies for your local libraries or schools and a guided tour of Battersea Power Station

€1500 - gets you 5 signed copies, 20 "Read it" badges, a "Read it" T-shirt & 5 copies for your local libraries or schools and a guided tour of Battersea Power Station

The Impact

This is a cool story for kids, great bedtime reading and something for parents to reflect on.

It has a big environmental message both for kids and grown-ups.

A percentage of profits from the sale of books will be equally divided between Comic Relief, Children in Need & Battersea Dogs & Cats Home.

If we get the book published we have sufficient connections to turn it into a show on kids TV...and you'll be able to say "Hey look I helped those guys"

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute at this time, you could help us by getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.

Feel free to share with your friends, family, neighbours, business contacts, work colleagues, local schools, libraries, drinking partners, fellow commuters and of course anyone you know currently living in and around the London area, previous residents and indeed those contemplating a move to our glorious capital.

The Indiegogo share tools on this page make it really easy for you to help us spread the word.

Thanks a million for your support.

story:
Metanoia's Manifesto

For as long as there has been art, there has, for some reason, been a tradition of the artist creating in a mystical and shrouded space; isolation and aloneness seem to be prerequisites for true art. Fortunately, many artists have voiced their dissatisfaction with this model of creation, asking for a way in which the creative act becomes also an act of community.

Metanoia’s mission is to be an answer to that question. This literary and art magazine features works that were created through collaborations of artists across genres and art forms, both together in a physical space, or in online forums. The goal of these collaborations was to bring artists out of their dark corners where they work alone, and into a place where the collective intellect became a force that expanded the creative experience.

Oxford defines metanoia as a “change in one’s way of life resulting from penitence or spiritual conversion”. While Metanoia is not so concerned with repenting sins or converting spiritual beliefs, we are, through our publication, striving to change the landscape of artistic creation by inviting artists to create within and across their communities. The theme of our first issue is “sanity”, a topic we believe broad enough (and complex enough) to allow for a wide range of freedom and exploration during the creative process.

 

Cheers,

The Editors

 

 

PS. We are striving to produce a high-quality publication that will be available to anyone who is interested in enjoying great literature and art. It will cost more than $200 for less than 50 copies of our first issue. We have international submissions, and the intellectual support of many people. Now we need your economical support to bring the project to life. Thanks to each and everyone of you.

story:
Hello. 

 My name is Alex Duncan: I am a writer, actor and idea-maker. 

An Army of Hearts is a story I wrote for a wonderful man: my Dad, Norm Duncan. It brightly addresses dark subject matter as it bounces through rhyming phrases to tell a tale of a person who is sick but strong as they realize that they have an An Army of Hearts marching for them. An Army that will be there in most any circumstance to provide Love and support, reminding the reader that light can shine through darkness.  This story is a day-maker.  A gift to give or some comfort to curl up with.  

How It Started...

This story is true. Three years ago, my Dad was diagnosed with cancer and my entire family along with his friends and community stopped whatever we were doing to be there. People would check in with me and ask how things were going, how he was doing and I found myself saying that he was alright, because he had an Army of support. I started to imagine this Army of Hearts and wrote a story about it to share with my Dad. I wanted photos of everyone who was rooting for him and praying for him, standing proudly with their hearts visible. After painting about fifty hearts, I set out into the world and was overwhelmed by the response. Enthusiasm and excitement met me wherever I went; people who I didn't even know reached out to me, sending me photos of them and their hearts, and asking to be apart of the Army. It was a time when we were not given answers and just had our spirits to fight with and this Army felt like a force of unity that could bring us all together. And together we could feel strong.

How It Grew...

When I completed the book and shared it with the many people involved, the response was really positive. There were finally words to fill the dark corners, buoyant, bright words where before there was just fearful silence.  I found myself thinking that this story was not just for my Dad but just spread a universal message of hope to anyone who was fighting a similar fight. With universal illustrations, the reader could dissolve into a world where Love overcomes fear and light shines through darkness, watching as characters wave banners of hope and overcome the unthinkable.

Where It's Marching...

With your help, I hope to create this illustrated picture book to accompany my rhyming words that tell this story of courage. I think picture books are unique because they can be enjoyed by an audience of any age and have the ability to broach difficult subject matter, to be the words where there are none. I believe in people's ability to heal through the power of the human spirit and think that there is a place for this story in the world.


YOU Can Help...

Tell you neighbours!  Tell your friends!! One a day until this ends!!!

story:
Do you appreciate poetry? 

Do you have an opinion regarding women with hairy legs?

If you answered Yes to one or both questions, keep reading!  

Who Am I?

I'm a poet, a woman, feminine, hairy, and fighting to have a place in the world by...

1. WRITING POETRY in the style and topic that donors request/commission, which will be posted on a public blog in addition to being gifted to the individuals who desire it; and

2. Requiring people who demand that I cater to their aesthetic conditioning by SHAVING my currently hairy legs to *pay me* to do so! Rather, they can pay for a vote (or multiple votes) to determine what I should do.  People who are supportive of my choice to remain natural may also cast votes!  

Why?

1. I want to be a professional poet! I'd love to produce a wide range of poems while raising money for the MFA program I was accepted into but cannot currently afford! 

2. Shaving takes time, energy, and commitment. I will no longer be bullied into it, but since so many people want to voice their opinions on the matter, I will let them have a say--if they pay me! 

3. I could offer free poetry workshops to women and girls with a focus on self-acceptance and bullying prevention. (I happen to be an educator as well as an artist, so this is totally feasible!)

I will share all the poetry generated as well as photographs of my legs and other natural things, on thenaturalpoetblog.wordpress.com  

What You Get

Poetry! 
Choose a topic and style, and I'll write it for you! Free verse or form, experimental or spiritual, mythological or humorous, songs set to existing music, speculative work, and epics are all options! I'll even write prose!* 
Influence!
Can't stand the look of hairy legs on a woman? Love it when women ignore demands placed upon their presentation? You can vote on my keeping--or not keeping--my legs natural! Either way, I'll tape a performance art piece in July catering to the majority's vote. 

How Voting Works

I've set up parallel perks to reflect donors' votes--"Stay Natural!" or "Shave!" This way, voting will be transparent; I will write updates and make pleasantly colored pie charts and bar graphs, but you can also calculate the results-in-progress all by yourself by browsing through how many perks are left. 

While poetry and gift options differ according to donation levels, all votes are equal--until you get to the Lobbyist level, where, for $1,002, you can buy 170 votes! 
And at the Multi-National Corporation level, you can demand that I spend a full month shaving my legs--or not--regardless of what the voters say!  Don't worry, I'll spend some amount of time doing what voters decide as well--unless someone donates $1,000,020 at the Goddess level, giving me the freedom to do whatever I want.**  
Donors at any level may choose to abstain from voting and merely request poetry or stories. Be sure to include an email address and other relevant contact information so that I can deliver perks. 

What I'll Do  

I need help funding: 

~Artistic projects--Inclusivity! Representation! Innovation! Positive vision! 

~Self-acceptance workshops and a related anthology representing diverse experiences!

~My graduate education--help the arts and education by helping an artist/educator refine her skills! 

Please support this campaign, share with your friends, and appreciate yourself whether you fit  your region's dominant aesthetic demands or not! 

*All writing produced during this campaign will be published on the blog. Requests containing content that discriminates against individuals on the basis of their race, culture, gender, sexuality, ability, or other aspects of their identity will not be honored; nor will requests depicting gratuitous violence.
**I will commit to doing as voters wish in July, after the campaign ends and votes are tallied. Depending on how much money I raise, I will continue through the summer of 2016; in September, I will reassess how I want to present myself, for whom, and why.

**I will commit to doing as voters wish in July, after the campaign ends and votes are tallied. Depending on how much money I raise, I will continue through the summer of 2016; in September, I will reassess how I want to present myself, for whom, and why.

story:
About the Book

Motherhood May Cause Drowsiness: Mom Stories from the Trenches is a mom lit parent humor anthology featuring creative non-fiction, personal stories, and poetry by 40 moms who are bloggers, writers, and or poets. The book launched, and was published on May 11, 2015. It is currently available on Amazon and Kindle.

What We Need

  • Our goal is to raise a minimum of $1900 to pay the contributors between $15 and $100 per submission (depending on their submission).
  • If we don’t reach our goal, including royalties, we might have to prolong payment, and scale back the amount. 

If you cannot contribute financially, you can still help:

Write a book review of our anthology on your blog. Conduct an interview of the publisher/editor, Lisa Nolan. Host a guest post (from us) on your blog. (Contact us by email by clicking on one of the above links.)

Would you like to meet the mom bloggers, writers, and poets who contributed to the anthology? VISIT OUR BLOG HERE!
What others are saying:

“From start to finish, this book is a gem. I can’t think of a mother who shouldn’t read it, whether you have a newborn or grown children, you will totally relate to these funny and heartwarming stories. This second edition includes 18 new essays from some amazing authors . . . 

“If you are a sleep-deprived mom, or know one, this is a book you definitely want to read. I know my best friend with a new baby is getting one instead of onesies and baby bottles!”–Stephanie Marsh, We Don't Chew Glass blog.

“Delightful and inspiring . . . A sweet reminder that I’m not crazy for always being exhausted–-and that laughing about all the mess is a REALLY good thing. Thanks, ladies–-you nailed it again!”–Meredith Spidel, Mom of the Year blog.

“Highly enjoyed my advance copy of Motherhood May Cause Drowsiness. From funny stories, like Lea Grover’s 'Bedtime Lament,' to practical advice such as Newlin de Rojas’ 'Seven Sacred Sleep Tenets,' there is something for every mom in this book. Child induced sleepiness is something to which every mother can relate and it is reflected perfectly in this collection of stories. Every mom needs to hear that they are not alone and that is just what they will get from this funny and touching book . . .”–Bambini Travel blog.

“Those who are fighting the battle of sleep deprivation will more than relate to this collection of stories from the trenches. Annie Swingen perfectly describes the feelings of guilt and self-doubt in the 'The New Parent Guilt Trip.' Renea Dearing-Dijab humorously admits to judging others before having kids herself–-something most parents have done. There are plenty of laughs and commiseration for new parents that should get them through those wee hours of the morning.”–Bunny B.

“The stories are sometimes thought-provoking ('What Mommies Need: Hint: It’s Not Sex'), sometimes laugh-inducing ('Motherhood Drove Me to Drink and Pass Out'), and–-most importantly–-ALWAYS honest. This book is a highly-relatable, easy-to-digest read for all moms out there. Totally recommended!”–Jessica Burdg

“What could be better than stories from actual moms? Motherhood is a mix of many things. Keeping your sense of humor is what keeps a mommy sane! A must read for the frazzled mom who has forgotten to just laugh!”–Michelle Smith

“Each story is funny and really shows how Moms feel on a daily basis. TIRED! I loved Jessica Azar’s story 'Motherhood drove me to drink and pass out.' Any Mom that can weave vodka, Merle Haggard, and one great hubby into the same story has my vote.

“This book would make a great gift for any Mom needing a fun laugh and a dose of reality.”–C. Lee Reed, Helicopter Mom and Just Plane Dad blog.

About the Publisher/Editor

Lisa Nolan is the editor and publisher of Monkey Star Press. She has sported more occupations than she can count. At fifteen she sold trinkets on downtown street corners in San Francisco (the city she was raised in by a single mom) and graduated to selling T-shirts to tourists.  She’s done waiting tables, retail, and daycare. She’s been a college student, a writer (still), a Montessori teacher (twenty glorious years), a graduate student (English literature and creative writing), a literary magazine associate editor (Flash Fiction), a children’s theater program director (the Marsh), a playwright, an underground comedy program director (The Mock Café), a theater manager (the Marsh), and a webmaster—until settling down to be a wife to a hard-working hubby (who still opens doors for her after twelve years), and a mom to a boy with Down syndrome.

She became a mom blogger in 2010, an indie author in 2011, and an indie publisher and editor in 2013.  She resides in Northern California with her family and an accidental watermelon patch. Monkey Star Press is a new, indie publishing company, based in the San Francisco Bay Area. It seeks to publish mom lit and kid lit.

STRETCH GOALS

  • $1900 will pay contributors between $15 and $50 per submission.
  • Stretch Goal #1: If we raise $3775, we will pay contributors between $25 and $100 per submission.
  • Stretch Goal #2: If we raise $7500 will pay contributors between $50 and $200 per submission.
  • Stretch Goal #3: If we raise $8500 will pay contributors between $50 and $200 per submission, and reimburse the publisher for $1000 in expenses ($150 for copy editing 18 submissions, $450 for book cover design, and $400 for sending each contributor a copy of the book).

This anthology has already been published, so there is almost no risk involved!

story:
My Quest to Create a New and Flourishing Genre of Writing

Hi, my name is Alexei Maxim Russell. I'm a writer from Canada. With a background in English Literature, I've produced works both through traditional publishing channels and through Indie channels and my work has gained a cult following. Passionate about reading, and the advancement of literature, I have read extensively about every theory and genre that relates to the craft of writing. 

I'm creating this campaign because I want to do something new and exciting for literature, but I need your help. But, in exchange, I am willing to give you something that money can't buy -- not under normal circumstances, anyways.

I have a brand new idea for a book. Whereas most writers pick a genre and then proceed to write in that genre, I've always admired the ones who struck out on their own, stepped outside the rigid limits of convention and, in the process, created a whole new genre. A brand new area of writing, an all-new setting and a whole new set of rules, which still inspire millions of readers and still encourage hundreds of new writers, to write in those new genres.

I'm talking about people like Robert E. Howard. He created the Sword and Sorcery sub-genre of Fantasy Fiction (thanks to which we have stories like Lord of the Rings and Conan the Barbarian) or people like Dashiel Hammet, who created the Hard-Boiled sub-genre of Detective fiction (like Sam Spade and the Maltese Falcon.)

These writers didn't just follow the crowd, they dared to experiment and think a new thought and in doing so, they expanded the limits of literature. And now, thanks to them, we have a rich, varied landscape of literature, that enriches all of our lives. And these are the people who inspire me. This is my quest. And I want you to be a part of that quest.

When you contribute to my campaign, you don't just help an artist and help to expand the limits of literature, you can actually become a part of literature.

I will write you into this novel! That's what I meant when I can offer you something that money cannot normally buy. I will immortalize you, in the very lines of this book -- the first pioneering book of an exciting new genre. I will preserve, in prose, your name and your existence, here on Earth, for all time to come.

If immortality does not appeal to you -- and I wouldn't necessarily blame you for that -- then you can nominate a friend, a family member or any other loved-one. You can give them "The Gift of Immortality." Now, there's the perfect gift for that person who has everything, wouldn't you say? You can't find a much more original gift than that!

The sub-genre I'm planning to create is a sub-genre of the Fantasy Genre. Back in the 1890s, a man by the name of John Kendrick Bangs invented a sub-genre of Fantasy that bears his name: Bangsian Fantasy. This genre has to do with the afterlife, exclusively. His creation of this sub-genre has inspired such modern, contemporary works as "What Dreams May Come" and "The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen." What I've wanted to do, for awhile, has been to expand this sub-genre. I've written Fantasy Novels; I've written Mystery Novels. So, what I wanted to do was to combine these two genres, in a Bangsian kind of way, and so make an all new sub-genre: The Afterlife Mystery Genre.

The rules of writing in this genre would be simple: It must take place entirely or mostly in the afterlife. It must involve the solving of one or more mysteries, as a significant part of the plot;  And it must be written in the style of Literary Realism.

Apart from the fact you are in the afterlife, it would be written in a "realist" manner. The effect would be as if you had walked out of your entirely realistic life, here on Earth, and into the afterlife, which is just as realistic. However, being the afterlife, it is entirely a mystery, where I imagine there are a great many mysteries to be solved.

I'm sure a lot of you can see, along with me, the rich potential for this sub-genre to flourish, given the endless mysteries to be imagined, in the afterlife and given the strong natural interest we all have, in the subject of the afterlife. I am convinced this sub-genre can flourish if it's done right and by someone who knows what it takes to make a new genre stick. I've studied the genre creators extensively and have studied what they did and I'm confident I know how to make a sub-genre stick. In fact, I already have the whole book written out, here in my head. All I lack is the funding I need to work on it, full-time.

And that is why I need your help. Depending on how much you're willing to give, you or a loved-one can get anything from a mention, in this new novel, to being featured as a significant character, in this book, as someone who directly affects the plot.  Besides immortality for you or a loved-one, you will be directly helping to expand the limits of literature and helping the cause of book lovers, the world over.


What I Need and What I Will Give You

I have the book in my head, already, but writing out a complex novel takes time and dedication, particularly if I need to find places for many contributors, to interweave into the chapters and the plot, in such a way that I can still do everything I need to do, to write a compelling work of literature, that will make this genre stick.

To create such a master work requires a year, at the very least, and so my wants are simply to cover my expenses, for the year, so that I am free to devote myself to nothing else, but my writing.

The total sum of $20,000 (minus Indiegogo's cut) will be divided into 12 parts, of approximately $1,500. These will cover my monthly expenses (bills, mortgage, car, insurance, gas, groceries, etc) over the entire 1 year period, which I will be devoting to this new book. As a struggling artist, accustomed to subsisting on Macaroni and Cheese and Ramen noodles, I am not exactly setting myself up for a life of luxury. I am not looking to improve my station in life, by any means, by raising money, through this campaign. I simply want to be able to meet my meagre and spartan wants, as I work diligently to construct the masterpiece that will immortalize you and the ones you love.

One month after I have received the funds, I will begin writing and guarantee I will have the finished manuscript -- polished and ready to publish -- within one year of that date. The reason why I will take a month off, before starting the book is because I want to personally email every contributor, reminding them of what they have purchased and what rights and entitlements that has granted them. Once I have let every one of you know what is going on, I will feel ready to begin. I will also be giving regular email updates, to let everyone know how the book is progressing.

What will I give you, in return? Well, I have six different varieties of immortality to offer you, all of which make a great, original gift to give to either yourself or a loved-one. For the full range of immortalities that I'm offering you, see the section marked "SELECT A PERK," on the upper right part of this webpage.


The Rules

There are several very important rules to remember, concerning this campaign. 1. is the rules that will apply to you, if you choose to embrace the gift of immortality. and 2. are the rules of the genre, which I am proposing to write. It is important to remember both. Because, if you claim one of the varieties of immortalities above, then you will probably be corresponding with me, personally, to assure your part in this story is agreeable to us both, before publication. In order for us to work together on this, effectively, you need to understand both your rights, in relation to what PERK you have bought and also the constraints of the genre, which I need to stick to, in order to successfully launch this new sub-genre and make it stick.

1. Level 1 Contributor.

If you buy the $40 PERK, then you are a Level 1 Contributor. This entitles you to have your name mentioned in the "Thank You" section, near the beginning of the book. Given you are not actually included in the story, you are not granted any influence over the actual book. Although your generous contribution to the expansion of the genre and the cause of literature is gratefully acknowledged. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds, if you decide to change your mind about being included in the "Thank You" section. Although we will gladly remove your name, if you so decide.

2. Level 2 Contributor.

If you buy the $80 PERK, then you are a Level 2 Contributor. This entitles you to have your name mentioned in the actual storyline. You are only granted a mention, by name and you can provide limited details, to be included, at your discretion. You will also be given one chance to suggest a change, in how your name is mentioned. What will happen is that, once I have reached the section of the book where your name is mentioned, I will send you the related text and ask if this mention is acceptable to you. I will also ask you if there are any limited details you would like included (such as what city you're from or what you do for a living, etc). After that first correspondence, where you will be given one chance to offer limited details and offer a suggestion or change, then you will have reached the limits of your entitlements, as a Level 2 Contributor. After this time, you'll have no further opportunity to influence the book, in any way or correspond with me. I don't want to seem unsociable, but I'll have a lot on my plate and so I have to set limits, ahead of time, to assure this book gets written, efficiently. Please understand that it is the your responsibility, alone, to provide me with a valid email address, by which I can get in touch with them. If I am unable to contact you, with the email address given, or if you don't reply as you should, for whatever reason, on the first attempt, I will consider all rights and entitlements of your level to have been abandoned, by you. I will try my best to accomodate any reasonable request, although I do not offer any guarantee that I will accept limited details or suggested changes, wholeheartedly, and reserve the right to refuse them, if I feel they are inappropriate. Even if refused, however, you are guaranteed that you will have your name mentioned in the book. If at any time, you have second thoughts and decide not to be mentioned in the story, you will be reverted to a Level 1 Contributor status, and will be mentioned in the "Thank You" section of the book. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds, In leiu of refund, we will offer you mention in the "Thank You" section.

3. Level 3 Contributor.

If you buy the $160 PERK, then you are a Level 3 Contributor. This entitles you to be portrayed as a visible character, within the storyline. You are granted the right to be described, visually and in other ways, and to have the undivided attention of the narrator, for a small section of text. Your visual portrayal will, in some way, serve to further the narrative. You are not, however, granted the right to any dialogue. This is a "non-speaking role," so to speak. You will also be given two chances to suggest a change, in how your visual character is portrayed and how it is used to advance the narrative of the given scene. What will happen is that, once I have reached the section of the book where your visual character is described, I will send you the related text and ask if this portrayal is acceptable to you. I will also ask you if there are any limited details you would like included (such as what city you're from or what you do for a living, etc). After that first correspondence, where you will be given the chance to offer limited details and offer a suggestion or change, then you will be given a second chance to give suggestions, if the portrayal of your character is still unacceptable or if you think of something else to include, afterwards. Please keep in mind, however, that, as a Level 2 Contributor, you are only entitled to two emails to me, making suggestions. After this time, you'll have no further opportunity to influence the book, in any way or correspond with me. I don't want to seem unsociable, but I'll have a lot on my plate and so I have to set limits, ahead of time, to assure this book gets written, efficiently. I will try my best to accomodate any reasonable request. Although I do reserve the right to refuse a change, if it seems to violate the law or the mores of society in too extreme a way. Although I do offer the chance for the Contributor to suggest a change, I cannot guarantee that I will accept the change, wholeheartedly, and reserve the right to refuse it. Even if refused, however, you are guaranteed your visual portrayal in the book. Please understand that it is the your responsibility, alone, to provide me with a valid email address, by which I can get in touch with you. If I am unable to contact you, with the email address given, or if you don't reply as you should, for whatever reason, on the first attempt, I will consider all rights and entitlements of your level to have been abandoned, by you. If at any time, you have second thoughts and decide not to be mentioned in the story, you will be reverted to a Level 1 Contributor status, and will be mentioned in the "Thank You" section of the book. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds,. In leiu of refund, we will offer you mention in the "Thank You" section.

4. Level 4 Contributor.

If you buy the $320 PERK, then you are a Level 4 Contributor. This entitles you to be portrayed as a minor character, within the storyline. You are granted the right to be described, visually and in other ways, to speak dialogue and to play a minor role in the plot. You are not, however, granted any significant influence over the plot. You will also be given ten chances to suggest a change, in how your minor character is portrayed, what it says and and how it is used to affect the plot. What will happen is that, once I have reached the section of the book where your minor character is described, I will send you the related text and ask if all aspects of this minor character's role is acceptable to you. I will also ask you if there are any additional details you would like included (such as what city you're from or what you do for a living, etc). Unlike the previous Contributor levels, you can add quite a bit of personal detail, to help flesh out your minor character, if you wish. After that first correspondence, where you will be given the chance to offer limited details and offer a suggestion or change, then you will be given nine more chances to give suggestions, if any aspect of your minor character is still unacceptable or if you think of something else to include, afterwards. Please keep in mind, however, that, as a Level 4 Contributor, you are only entitled to ten emails to me, making suggestions. After this time, you'll have no further opportunity to influence the book, in any way or correspond with me. I don't want to seem unsociable, but I'll have a lot on my plate and so I have to set limits, ahead of time, to assure this book gets written, efficiently. Please understand that it is the your responsibility, alone, to provide me with a valid email address, by which I can get in touch with them. If I am unable to contact you, with the email address given, or if you don't reply as you should, for whatever reason, on the first attempt, I will consider all rights and entitlements of your level to have been abandoned, by you. Although I do offer the chance for the Contributor to suggest a change, I cannot guarantee that I will accept the change, wholeheartedly, and reserve the right to refuse it. Even if refused, however, you are guaranteed to be portrayed as a minor character in the book. If at any time, you have second thoughts and decide not to be mentioned in the story, you will be reverted to a Level 1 Contributor status, and will be mentioned in the "Thank You" section of the book. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds, In leiu of refund, we will offer you mention in the "Thank You" section. You will also entitled to one signed copy of the book, with a personalized message, once the book is published.

5. Level 5 Contributor.

If you buy the $640 PERK, then you are a Level 5 Contributor. This entitles you to be portrayed as a major character, within the storyline. You are granted the right to be described, visually and in other ways, to speak dialogue and to influence the plot in a significant way. You will also be given unlimited chances to suggest a change, in how your character is portrayed, what it says and and how it is used to affect the plot. What will happen is that, once I have planned and fleshed out all sections of the book where your character is described, I will send you the related text and ask if all aspects of this character's role is acceptable to you. I will also ask you if there are any additional details you would like included (such as what city you're from or what you do for a living, etc). Unlike some previous Contributor levels, you can add any amount of personal details, to help flesh out your character, if you wish. As a Level 5 Contributor, you are entitled to unlimited suggestions and you are free to contact me any time, during the entire creation period of this book. In fact, this book will not be considered complete, until you are completely satisfied with how your character is portrayed and all things related to your character, within the book. There are a few limits on the Level 5 Contributor however. For one, if the 1 year deadline, for the creation of this book, has elapsed, then you can no longer make suggestions and the book will be published in the form it was in, at the end of the 1 year deadline. Also, although you must be satisfied with your character, your opinion on the plot will not influence whether or not the book is complete. Only a Level 6 Contributor is given the privilege to decide the plot, in such a way that the book is not completed, until they are completely satisfied with the plot. Please understand that it is the your responsibility, alone, to provide me with a valid email address, by which I can get in touch with them. If I am unable to contact you, with the email address given, or if you don't reply as you should, for whatever reason, on the first attempt, I will consider all rights and entitlements of your level to have been abandoned, by you. Although I do offer the chance for the Contributor to suggest a change, I cannot guarantee that I will accept the change, wholeheartedly, and reserve the right to refuse it. Even if refused, however, you are guaranteed to be portrayed as a minor character in the book. If at any time, you have second thoughts and decide not to be mentioned in the story, you will be reverted to a Level 1 Contributor status, and will be mentioned in the "Thank You" section of the book. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds, In leiu of refund, we will offer you mention in the "Thank You" section. You will also entitled to five signed copies of the book, with a personalized message, once the book is published.

6. Level 6 Contributor.

If you buy the $1280 PERK, then you are a Level 6 Contributor. This entitles you to be portrayed as a protagonist or antagonist, within the storyline. You are granted the right to be described, visually and in other ways, to speak dialogue and to influence the plot in a fundamental way. You will also be given unlimited chances to suggest a change, in how your character is portrayed, what it says and and how it is used to affect the plot. You will also be given unlimited chances to suggest plot changes. What will happen is that, once I have decided on the nature of your character and the entire arc of your character, within the story, I will send you the related text and ask if all aspects of this character's role is acceptable to you, as well as the nature of the plot. I will also ask you if there are any additional details you would like included (such as what city you're from or what you do for a living, etc). Unlike some previous Contributor levels, you can add any amount of personal details, to help flesh out your character, if you wish. As a Level 6 Contributor, you are entitled to unlimited suggestions and you are free to contact me any time, during the entire creation period of this book. In fact, this book will not be considered complete, until you are completely satisfied with both how your character is portrayed and the nature of the plot. The only limit on a Level 6 Contributor, is if the 1 year deadline, for the creation of this book, has elapsed, In this case, then you can no longer make suggestions and the book will be published in the form it was in, at the end of the 1 year deadline. One additional minor limitation is that, once you have selected to be either a Protagonist or Antagonist, you cannot change that selection. Please understand that it is the your responsibility, alone, to provide me with a valid email address, by which I can get in touch with you. If I am unable to contact you, with the email address given, or if you don't reply, as you should, for whatever reason, on the first attempt, I will consider all rights and entitlements of your level to have been abandoned, by you. Although I do offer the chance for the Contributor to suggest a change, I cannot guarantee that I will accept the change, wholeheartedly, and reserve the right to refuse it. Even if refused, however, you are guaranteed to be portrayed as a protagonist or antagonist in the book. If at any time, you have second thoughts and decide not to be mentioned in the story, you will be reverted to a Level 1 Contributor status, and will be mentioned in the "Thank You" section of the book. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds, In leiu of refund, we will offer you mention in the "Thank You" section. You will also entitled to ten signed copies of the book, with a personalized message, once the book is published.

RULES OF THE "AFTERLIFE MYSTERY" GENRE

This genre is defined by the fact that it takes place mostly or entirely in the afterlife, that it contains a mystery as a major or central element of the plot and that it is written in a thoroughly realistic style. If, as a Level 2 to Level 6 contributor, you ever make a suggestion either in your character or the plot, which would violate the above guidelines for the genre, then I will reserve the right to refuse your change, no matter your Level or the otherwise reasonableness of your request. I may also reject a suggestion if I feel it detracts too much from the compelling features and other essentail story components that make a new genre style "stick" and become popular, based on my experience, within the public at large.


Risks & Challenges

With an unconventional campaign like this, there are a LOT of unknowns. As with the highly original inventors of a new genre, themselves, I'm boldly striking off, on my own, into an entirely new territory, where no one can warn me, from their experience, what pitfalls await me. Given that a campaign like this doesn't happen every day, it's impossible to know all the challenges that could come out of left field, but I've been racking my brains, trying to anticipate them. So here they are:

1. Too many names; too many characters; and too many protagonists.

In the pleasant, yet daunting, circumstance that I wind up with 1,000 minor characters, 500 major characters, 100 protagonists and 55 antagonists, I will be in an admirable, yet incredibly difficult spot! This would definitely be the ultimate challenge for any author, and would require every skill in my writer's arsenal and my most masterful attentions, for every single moment of that year! I would, of course, rise to the challenge, and attempt to fulfill every single obligation, faithfully and to the complete satisfaction of all 1,655 of you! 

However, in the interest of fairness and transparency, I would utilize any extra funds I earn, in order to schedule more dedicated writing time. For example, if I earn 20,000, I will write 1 book in a year. If I earned twice as much, I will make this book a series and write one book a year, working through my list of contributors, chronologically. I will continue to do this, until I am out of money. I will ensure, and guarantee, that I will run through my entire list of contributors and fulfill my obligations to you all, even if it takes eight years and swells into an Octet series.

2. Not enough names; not enough money; and not enough time.

Given this situation, I will extend the campaign, within reason, until I have reached the goal that I need, to devote a year to this book. I am keen to ensure that all my generous contributors do get the chance to become a part of my novel, as planned. In the circumstance, however, that I have executed many campaigns, and it seems hopeless, and I give up the campaign, I will simply write a book of shorter length than I had originally planned. This novella will be as long or as short as I have earned the resources to create. However, this short format will make it more of a challenge for me to make it into such a compelling work that it successfully launches this new and exciting genre. In this case, however, all contributors will still enjoy the opportunity to be immortalized in a novella, rather than a novel. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you need time to think about it, that's perfectly ok. There are so many other ways you can help me, in the mean time, without paying anything.  

For example, you can help so much just by sharing this campaign on your social media. That helps me a lot, by helping me connect with the people who may be looking for exactly this kind of quirky gift, for a loved-one, or who may want the gift of immortality, for themselves! 

Or you can help a lot, by simply following my campaign. Join me on facebook, twitter, tumblr, google+, Instagram or Vine to get regular updates. I'll be shooting videos every week or less, to let people know how the campaign is going and to thank those who have already secured their eternal place in this new work of literature. My Quest to Create a New and Flourishing Genre of Writing Hi, my name is Alexei Maxim Russell. I'm a writer from Canada. With a background in English Literature, I've produced works both through traditional publishing channels and through Indie channels and my work has gained a cult following. Passionate about reading, and the advancement of literature, I have read extensively about every theory and genre that relates to the craft of writing. 
I'm creating this campaign because I want to do something new and exciting for literature, but I need your help. But, in exchange, I am willing to give you something that money can't buy -- not under normal circumstances, anyways.
I have a brand new idea for a book. Whereas most writers pick a genre and then proceed to write in that genre, I've always admired the ones who struck out on their own, stepped outside the rigid limits of convention and, in the process, created a whole new genre. A brand new area of writing, an all-new setting and a whole new set of rules, which still inspire millions of readers and still encourage hundreds of new writers, to write in those new genres.
I'm talking about people like Robert E. Howard. He created the Sword and Sorcery sub-genre of Fantasy Fiction (thanks to which we have stories like Lord of the Rings and Conan the Barbarian) or people like Dashiel Hammet, who created the Hard-Boiled sub-genre of Detective fiction (like Sam Spade and the Maltese Falcon.)
These writers didn't just follow the crowd, they dared to experiment and think a new thought and in doing so, they expanded the limits of literature. And now, thanks to them, we have a rich, varied landscape of literature, that enriches all of our lives. And these are the people who inspire me. This is my quest. And I want you to be a part of that quest.
When you contribute to my campaign, you don't just help an artist and help to expand the limits of literature, you can actually become a part of literature.
I will write you into this novel! That's what I meant when I can offer you something that money cannot normally buy. I will immortalize you, in the very lines of this book -- the first pioneering book of an exciting new genre. I will preserve, in prose, your name and your existence, here on Earth, for all time to come.
If immortality does not appeal to you -- and I wouldn't necessarily blame you for that -- then you can nominate a friend, a family member or any other loved-one. You can give them "The Gift of Immortality." Now, there's the perfect gift for that person who has everything, wouldn't you say? You can't find a much more original gift than that!
The sub-genre I'm planning to create is a sub-genre of the Fantasy Genre. Back in the 1890s, a man by the name of John Kendrick Bangs invented a sub-genre of Fantasy that bears his name: Bangsian Fantasy. This genre has to do with the afterlife, exclusively. His creation of this sub-genre has inspired such modern, contemporary works as "What Dreams May Come" and "The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen." What I've wanted to do, for awhile, has been to expand this sub-genre. I've written Fantasy Novels; I've written Mystery Novels. So, what I wanted to do was to combine these two genres, in a Bangsian kind of way, and so make an all new sub-genre: The Afterlife Mystery Genre.
The rules of writing in this genre would be simple: It must take place entirely or mostly in the afterlife. It must involve the solving of one or more mysteries, as a significant part of the plot;  And it must be written in the style of Literary Realism.
Apart from the fact you are in the afterlife, it would be written in a "realist" manner. The effect would be as if you had walked out of your entirely realistic life, here on Earth, and into the afterlife, which is just as realistic. However, being the afterlife, it is entirely a mystery, where I imagine there are a great many mysteries to be solved.
I'm sure a lot of you can see, along with me, the rich potential for this sub-genre to flourish, given the endless mysteries to be imagined, in the afterlife and given the strong natural interest we all have, in the subject of the afterlife. I am convinced this sub-genre can flourish if it's done right and by someone who knows what it takes to make a new genre stick. I've studied the genre creators extensively and have studied what they did and I'm confident I know how to make a sub-genre stick. In fact, I already have the whole book written out, here in my head. All I lack is the funding I need to work on it, full-time.
And that is why I need your help. Depending on how much you're willing to give, you or a loved-one can get anything from a mention, in this new novel, to being featured as a significant character, in this book, as someone who directly affects the plot.  Besides immortality for you or a loved-one, you will be directly helping to expand the limits of literature and helping the cause of book lovers, the world over.

What I Need and What I Will Give You
I have the book in my head, already, but writing out a complex novel takes time and dedication, particularly if I need to find places for many contributors, to interweave into the chapters and the plot, in such a way that I can still do everything I need to do, to write a compelling work of literature, that will make this genre stick.
To create such a master work requires a year, at the very least, and so my wants are simply to cover my expenses, for the year, so that I am free to devote myself to nothing else, but my writing.
The total sum of $20,000 (minus Indiegogo's cut) will be divided into 12 parts, of approximately $1,500. These will cover my monthly expenses (bills, mortgage, car, insurance, gas, groceries, etc) over the entire 1 year period, which I will be devoting to this new book. As a struggling artist, accustomed to subsisting on Macaroni and Cheese and Ramen noodles, I am not exactly setting myself up for a life of luxury. I am not looking to improve my station in life, by any means, by raising money, through this campaign. I simply want to be able to meet my meagre and spartan wants, as I work diligently to construct the masterpiece that will immortalize you and the ones you love.
One month after I have received the funds, I will begin writing and guarantee I will have the finished manuscript -- polished and ready to publish -- within one year of that date. The reason why I will take a month off, before starting the book is because I want to personally email every contributor, reminding them of what they have purchased and what rights and entitlements that has granted them. Once I have let every one of you know what is going on, I will feel ready to begin. I will also be giving regular email updates, to let everyone know how the book is progressing.

What will I give you, in return? Well, I have six different varieties of immortality to offer you, all of which make a great, original gift to give to either yourself or a loved-one. For the full range of immortalities that I'm offering you, see the section marked "SELECT A PERK," on the upper right part of this webpage.

It is important to remember both. Because, if you claim one of the varieties of immortalities above, then you will probably be corresponding with me, personally, to assure your part in this story is agreeable to us both, before publication. Although your generous contribution to the expansion of the genre and the cause of literature is gratefully acknowledged. Unfortunately, due to the extreme logistical difficulties it could present, and the many ways it could serve to distract from the writing process, we will not be offering any refunds, if you decide to change your mind about being included in the "Thank You" section. Although we will gladly remove your name, if you so decide.

I will also ask you if there are any limited details you would like included (such as what city you're from or what you do for a living, etc). After that first correspondence, where you will be given one chance to offer limited details and offer a suggestion or change, then you will have reached the limits of your entitlements, as a Level 2 Contributor. CAMMAC est un petit paradis pour amateurs de la musique de tous âges. Le PLAISIR de faire de la musique est l'ingrédient essentiel qui réunit depuis 1953 des musiciens professionnels chevronnés, des amateurs passionnés, et des novices avides de se joindre à la fête!LA MISSION DE CAMMAC : encourager les personnes de tout âge à vivre la joie de faire de la musique ensemble dans un cadre accueillant et coopératif.

Le Centre musical CAMMAC a la taille idéale d’un petit village pour accueillir de nouveaux immigrés. En effet, la musique offre un contexte idéal pour rassembler les gens et l’aspect intergénérationnel de CAMMAC nous permet d’accueillir tous les membres d’une famille pour vivre une semaine d’intégration ensemble.

LA MISSION DE CAMMAC : Encourager les personnes de tout âge à vivre la joie de faire de la musique ensemble dans un cadre accueillant et coopératif.

LA VISION DE CAMMAC :

  • Par la musique d’ensemble, tisser les liens qui constituent les ingrédients essentiels d’une vie heureuse, saine et productive;
  • Par des expériences artistiques communes, cultiver sa croissance personnelle et un sentiment d’appartenance;
  • Par les conseils d’excellents professeurs, apprendre, écouter et faire de la musique ensemble;
  • Par l’exposition à un milieu bilingue, établir des ponts entre nos cultures.

Gluten Free Around the World: The Short Story

Over 40 million people in the gluten-free community deal with a range of issues including gluten sensitivity, celiac disease, wheat allergies, autism spectrum, and many other medical or personal health conditions. For most of us, traveling and eating out isn't fun. Instead, it can be difficult, time-consuming, and unhealthy. After traveling around the world and back, all while eating gluten-free, I am determined to change this. We need your help to create this valuable travel guide resource for the growing gluten-free community!


Gluten Free Around the World: The Back Story

For me, going gluten-free after being diagnosed with celiac disease as an adult was both a blessing and a curse. On the plus side, I finally knew why I had been living with a stomach ache and related issues (celiac disease has over 300 symptoms!) for most of my life, and I held the basic information I needed to get back on the road to health and feeling normal.

On the downside, transitioning to a gluten-free lifestyle comes with a steep learning curve. Have you ever realized just how many foods are made with wheat, barley, or rye? Avoiding these foods might sound easy, but in practice, it’s incredibly difficult, since it seems as though gluten is in everything! Like all gluten-free eaters, I have to read every food label, maintain strict no-gluten rules in my food preparation areas, and ask way more food-related questions than anyone wants to answer.

And that’s just eating in my own kitchen! Eating away from home presents a whole new set of challenges and requires hours of research and menu reading, calling and emailing restaurants with questions in advance, and structuring a lot of my day around food. (Well, that last part isn’t so bad.) When I first went gluten-free, just the thought of all of the time, effort, and resources that went into planning a trip with food restrictions was enough to make me stay home.

Fortunately, after a few years, traveling gluten-free has gotten a little easier. Since I am a food and travel writer and editor by trade and an explorer by nature, I love nothing more than learning about new cities and cultures through food. I have become adept at seeking out healthy, safe gluten-free food in all corners of the world, and for the past year, I have written about these finds on my blog, Gluten-Free Jet Set. With this Gluten Free Around the World project, I’ll take this food and travel writing to the next level and provide you with worldwide gluten-free coverage in eBooks that you can access anywhere.


Gluten Free Around the World: The Project

Above all, this project is about the community of over 40 million gluten-free eaters, which, chances are, includes you or someone you know. Have you ever decided not to visit a city because you couldn't find a restaurant with a gluten-free menu? Canceled a trip because you didn't have the hours and hours to research safe places to eat? Had to eat prepackaged snacks for every meal instead of risking meals out in a country where you don't speak the language? These guides are for you!

Many excellent resources are out there to help people eat and cook gluten-free at home, but managing a gluten-free lifestyle while traveling remains a major challenge. With the complete Gluten Free Around the World guides in hand, gluten-free eaters will be prepared to eat safe, delicious, and healthy food wherever their business or leisure travel leads. Even better, since these digital guides will be in eBook format, they can accompany you anywhere you take your mobile devices.

On Gluten-Free Jet Set, I’ve already written about eating gluten-free in many popular destinations, including New York City, Washington DC, Seattle, Atlanta, Paris, Vienna, Berlin, Rome, and Tokyo. Over the next year, our team will visit, research, and write about the gluten-free experience in many more locations around the globe. Destinations that we plan to feature in the Gluten Free Around the World guides include:

  • North America: New York, Los Angeles, Maui, Las Vegas
  • Europe: Paris, London, Dublin, Amsterdam, Istanbul
  • Middle East: Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Tel Aviv
  • Asia: Tokyo, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Beijing
  • Africa: Johannesburg, Cape Town, Marrakesh
  • Australia & Oceania: Sydney, Bali
  • South America: Buenos Aires, Rio de Janeiro

The complete Gluten Free Around the World eBook will cover the gluten-free experience in major cities and regions around the world. The eBook will address challenges that travelers can expect to face; relay tips for navigating the local cuisine; outline basic terms and words in non-English-speaking locations; discuss region-specific gluten-free products; and highlight a variety of the best gluten-free options at restaurants, cafés, and hotels. The eBook will also tackle how to prepare to travel to these various regions, including what to expect on the airplane, in the airport, in the train station, and on the road. Each gluten-free city guide eBooklet will focus on a major city or region. The eBooklets will include additional city-specific information and recommendations. Each eBooklet will also feature a daily itinerary, with suggestions for navigating the city's main attractions while packing in the best gluten-free spots.


Why We Need Your Help & What You Get in Return

Researching, writing, editing, and self-publishing these guides takes serious commitment and funds. Because we see a HUGE need for this comprehensive resource, we are dedicated to making it happen. We have already funded and planned for the research portion of the project. We've mapped out the destinations, planned travel and logistics, and connected with locals.

We need YOUR help to produce the final products. Your generous contributions will make it possible for us to share this extensive research, knowledge, and experience with the rest of the gluten-free community. Your help will allow us to publish the complete world eBook guide, Gluten Free Around the World, AND a series of city gluten-free guide eBooklets. You'll also get to travel vicariously with us for a year, as we send you exclusive updates, tips, and photos from abroad.

We're asking for $18,000 to achieve these goals. We know that's not small potatoes, and we want you to know how important any and all of your contributions are to this project. In return, our fun perks include one or more city eBooklet gluten-free guides, a copy of the complete Gluten Free Around the World eBook, a gluten-free travel planning consultation, and a box of our favorite global gluten-free goodies. Want to have a voice in the book? The biggest contributors can help us expand the scope of our research by funding the inclusion of an additional city of their choice.

We think our goal is achievable with your help, but if we don't make it, we will have to scale back our offerings. Rest assured that your contributions will still go to the production and publication of the city eBooklet gluten-free guides and will continue to help the gluten-free community.

Risks & Challenges

This is an ambitious project, but fortunately, we are prepared to take on the risks and challenges involved! Our team is trained and experienced in all components of this project, including travel planning and logistics. Anna is an experienced food and travel writer as well as a trained book and photo editor. Loren is an experienced multimedia and web producer. Together we are the perfect team to launch Gluten Free Around the World. We are committed to producing nothing less than professional finished products. As the ultimate gluten-free travel dream team, we can't wait to make travel easier for gluten-free eaters.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even $15 helps us to get closer to our goal, but we know not everyone can or wants to contribute financially. You can help in other ways, too!

  • Follow us on Facebook or Twitter and share our daily posts highlighting a city and cuisine featured in the project.
  • Share the link to this campaign with your family and friends via email. Most of us have at least one gluten-free friend or family member!
  • Subscribe to our Gluten-Free Jet Set newsletter for regular updates on the project, upcoming destinations, and release dates for the city eBooklet gluten-free guides.

Thank you thank you thank you for all of your support!!

story:
Short Summary

Walk into Barnes & Noble, and you'll see half a dozen books about breastfeeding, yet not a single one of them has a faith-based perspective. Why is that important? Breastfeeding really is the way that God designed  mothers to feed their babies. We see it throughout the Bible. In Fed by God's Design  you will see
  • The Scriptural basis for breastfeeding
  • Basic anatomy, physiology and endocrinology that makes it work -- in terms that make sense
  • Great tips for avoiding and dealing with potential problems
  • What you need to know to successfully feed your baby at every stage
  • A chapter just for Grandmothers....unique and practical advice to help her help Mom
  • Dealing with unexpected, difficult situations like prematurity, infant illness or even death
  • Combining the need to return to work with breastfeeding
  • Why it ISN'T breastfeeding that makes you a good mother,,,and what DOES make you a great mom!

What We Need & What You Get

In order to get this book to market, we need

  • $6000 to fund the publication and basic marketing of Fed by God's Design
  • Pictures of babies breastfeeding
  • A national team of excited moms and moms-to-be to help us get the book into Christian bookstores nationwide

When you help us bring this book to market, you can get

  • a copy of the book - either a download. or a print copy depending on your support level
  • Adorable Fed by God's Design infant gifts
  • The possibility of having your baby pictured in the book or maybe even on the front or back cover!

    The Impact

    The available resources in many Christian bookstores just do not provide the information that mothers need about breastfeeding. That's why I wrote this book. It is the culmination of 10 years of thought, prayer and waiting for the right time. I believe that this is the right time because of the resurgence of interest in breastfeeding and the focus from governmental agencies all the way down to local initiatives on helping mothers nurse their babies. I believe we will make a difference in the following ways:

    • Evidence-based breastfeeding advice will take a foothold in churches that might have previously offered other less scientifically sound materials. As a pastor's wife and an International Board Certified Lactation Consultant with 20+ years of experience helping mothers and babies, I am uniquely qualified to write this book.
    • Christian mothers will have a resource that encourages them on multiple levels
    • Mothers who read this book will be challenged to consider the importance of a personal, intimate relationship with Christ as a fundamental cornerstone of parenting.

    Risks & Challenges

    As a previously unpublished book author, I have to overcome the stigma that is sometimes associated with self-publishing.. However, I think we have what it takes to successfully do just that.

    • I am publishing with Westbow Press, an imprint of Thomas Nelson. Several years ago, my agent actually had a deal in place with Thomas Nelson. It fell through when Thomas Nelson cut the unknown authors from their backlist.
    • I had noted author Martha Sears review the book and give me her feedback. I took that feedback to improve the book. 
    • My experience as a writer (numerous magazine and journal articles as well as a blog) and an editor (a parenting magazine), has prepared me for this project.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    This book is the fruition of years of prayer and effort. I know that my work has just begun, and even if you can't help out financially, you can still be part of the team!

    • Share this campaign with everyone in your sphere of influence. Let's get the word out far and wide in churches, fellowships and faith-based communities across the country.
    • Pray for God's blessings on Fed by God's Design
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

    And that's all there is to it.

story:
CONCEPT

============

Inchallapeace is a non-political fashion project launched by a Muslim lady living in Switzerland. It’s goal is to gather people around the messages of peace, tolerance and respect for all human beings and religions.

By supporting inchallapeace, Muslims (and non Muslims) show their commitment to be actors of peace around the world and contribute to the programs of the UNESCO in favor of education and peace.


If this sounds meaningful to you, help inchallapeace raise funds to spread the words of peace through fasionable jewelry and accessories.



ABOUT THE FOUNDER

===========================

Thank you for your interest in Inchallapeace! 

I was born and raised in Morocco. I lived in Paris for more than ten years where I studied and worked in international environments. I have always wanted to launch a non-political project in the fields of peace and brotherhood amongst cultures and religions. I have been living in Geneva since late 2011 and thought it was time to make this wish come true, Geneva being the world capital of peace.

I am passionate about entrepreneurship (my daily work), innovation, creativity and the civic spirit. I am commited to contribute to those fields via different initiatives of which goal is to bring a positive change in the society or the economy (Creative Mornings, DrinkEntrepreneurs, Junior Chamber International, etc.). I am launching Inchallapeace in order to act for peace in a concrete way. 



THE BRAND

==============

The brand introduces modernity in the models, the materials, the design process, the production process and the business model.

Modernity, fun and openness

The designs are created by a community of designers that live all over the world. They create in total liberty and no one influences their work.

>>> By working with people from all over the world, regardless to their religion, we integrate the notion of peace and love.

Call for peace

Each product is proposed along with a message calling for peace and tolerance for all human beings and religions.preaching peace and tolerance for all human beings and religions.

>>> More than inspire, ultimately, Inchallapeace’s goal is to come up with a platform allowing people from all over the world to participate in the process of writing words of peace and making it go viral on social networks.

Charity

A part of the margin goes to charity: this project supports the UNESCO’s mission to educate and build peace in people’s mind.

>>> As education is the pillar of understanding and judgment, we chose to support the fantastic UNESCO programs. “UNESCO exists to bring [a] creative intelligence to life; for it is in the minds of men and women that the defences of peace and the conditions for sustainable development must be built.” - www.unesco.org



PRODUCTS

====================

Inchallapeace is a startup. Then, a range of products and services will be proposed progressively.

All the products will be designed based on new trends, modernity, colors and fun. On the one hand, the jewelry and accessories will support peace globaly, regardless to the religion or culture ; on the other hand, some products will support a specific cause.

A part of the margin will always go to the UNESCO programs for education and peace.

First cause

As a first cause, we chose to gather the millions of Muslims, men and women, who believe Islam is a religion of tolerance and peace.

The goal is to help rebuild a positive and friendly image of Islam, in a context where amalgams and tensions grow inside and outside Muslim communities.

First product

The first product is a range of creative and colorful jewelry. We voluntarily chose a dove, for it symbolises peace, designed by an Indian citizen. In its wings, we can read the word "Allah", written in Arabic in a very modern style.

The "Allah Dove Of Peace" will be proposed on a gourmet, a necklace and a pin.


High quality 3D Printed & made in the USA jewelry

The Dove Of Peace design has been sent to a company based in the USA - specialised in 3D printing - in order to create the prototypes and launch the first production. 



CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN

===================================

It is essential, not only to produce the jewelry, but also to spread the words of peace as widely as possible. Women, men, young, old, conservative, hipsters, mipsters (Muslim hipsters), from Africa to Asia, regardless of the religion.

According to the business plan, this project needs around EUR 80'000 to be viable. However, to produce the first stock of products and communicate on the first collection - being sure to get the expected viral impact - EUR 50'000 is a suitable budget (seed money).

Destination of funds

30% - Produce the first stock of the jewelry (+packaging, letters), distribute to the participants of the crowdfunding campaign, first sales

10% - Create afresh website with an e-shop and a platform where anyone can share words of peace

40% - Communication (events, fashion fairs, social networks, blogs and other media)

10% - Distribution and logistics

10% - R&D, creation of the next collection, intellectual property


Done!

= July 2014 - Creation of the first design 

= July 2014 - Test of the concept

= August 2014 - Creation of different prototypes

= September 2014 - Launch of the website, the fanpage and the Twitter account

= September 2014 - Arrival of the final 3D printed & made in USA jewelry

= September 2014 - Launch of the Indiegogo campaign

= October 2014 - Order of an important quantity of jewelry

= October 2014 - New version of the website

= Coming soon - Opening of the e-shop!



IIMPACT

==========

By supporting inchallapeace, we all show our commitment to be actors of peace around the world and we contribute to the programs of the UNESCO in favor of education and peace.



OTHER WAYS TO HELP

===========================

= Share this project with people around you
= Any feedback or idea is welcome
= Like the fanpage Inchallapeace or follow us on Twitter
= Donate to a UNESCO project



CONTACT

============

Write: contact@inchallapeace.com

Follow: https://twitter.com/inchallapeace
